list.name: The Miraculous Adventures of the Traveler
list.desc:
[Version 1]

"This story is quite wild and can be almost disorienting to read initially, but its wonderment grows on you, and it contains many a moment of gut-busting laughter. I liked it very much." — Ms. Hina

[Version 2]

"This is a rather orthodox light novel, with its contents essentially being an edited version of real life in Teyvat. What is surprising, however, is that the author seems to be highly knowledgeable about Watatsumi Island, with many vivid, almost lifelike descriptions." — Ms. Hina

[Version 3]

"This light novel is based on school life and depicts the antics of all manner of schoolyard oddballs. A very entertaining read." — Ms. Hina

[Version 4]

"By blending many styles together, this seemingly thin book transports you into a great many tales. I can only imagine that its author must also be a very interesting person. I happen to know someone like that, in fact — something that lends this book a very familiar touch." — Ms. Hina

list.name: A Firsthand Guide to Summoning Spirits
list.desc: A light novel that has been popular in Inazuma lately. It contains all manner of bizarre tales involving ancient youkai.

list.name: "The Seventh Samurai" Script
list.desc: A "film script" you obtained from Xavier.

list.name: Torn Page: Toki Alley Tales (I)
list.desc:
Collect all 10 pages to form Toki Alley Tales (I).

This page billows about in the breeze, seemingly having dropped from a very old novel.
Perhaps you might be able to reconstruct the complete text, should you find other torn pages elsewhere.

list.name: Torn Page: Toki Alley Tales (III)
list.desc:
Collect all 10 pages to form Toki Alley Tales (III).

This page billows about in the breeze, seemingly having dropped from a very old novel.
Perhaps you might be able to reconstruct the complete text, should you find other torn pages elsewhere.

list.name: Torn Page: Toki Alley Tales (II)
list.desc:
Collect all 10 pages to form Toki Alley Tales (II).

This page billows about in the breeze, seemingly having dropped from a very old novel.
Perhaps you might be able to reconstruct the complete text, should you find other torn pages elsewhere.

list.name: Torn Page: Toki Alley Tales (V)
list.desc:
Collect all 10 pages to form Toki Alley Tales (V).

This page billows about in the breeze, seemingly having dropped from a very old novel.
Perhaps you might be able to reconstruct the complete text, should you find other torn pages elsewhere.

list.name: Torn Page: Toki Alley Tales (IV)
list.desc:
Collect all 10 pages to form Toki Alley Tales (IV).

This page billows about in the breeze, seemingly having dropped from a very old novel.
Perhaps you might be able to reconstruct the complete text, should you find other torn pages elsewhere.

list.name: Torn Page: Toki Alley Tales (Prologue)
list.desc:
Collect all 10 pages to form Toki Alley Tales (Prologue).

This page billows about in the breeze, seemingly having dropped from a very old novel.
Perhaps you might be able to reconstruct the complete text, should you find other torn pages elsewhere.

list.name: Debates on the "Viceroy of the East"
list.desc: The "Viceroy of the East," or "Touzannou" sung of in Watatsumi folk tradition is also known as the "Akuou" all across Raiden's domains. He was the first vassal ruler of the Great Serpent Orobashi, and he was also the last.

list.name: Childe and Teucer's Mora Pouch
list.desc:
Funds for Teucer's entertainment, provided by Childe, now mixed in with the stash you received from Teucer earlier...
The face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

list.name: "The Adventurer's Burdens"
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making "The Adventurer's Burdens."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Chilled Meat
list.desc:
Rare, fresh meat.
This species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

list.name: Cleansing Shrine
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Cleansing Shrine.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: "Courtyard Cleansing Pool"
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a "Courtyard Cleansing Pool."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Philosophies of Diligence
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

list.name: Guide to Diligence
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

list.name: Teachings of Diligence
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Diligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

list.name: The Crux Clash Champion Medal
list.desc: A medal awarded by the organizers of The Crux Clash. It is proof that you are the undisputed champion of this tournament. But it is not so much the duels you experienced that you will look back on — rather, it is the story of a Vision and the pursuit of ideals.

list.name: Calla Lily Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Calla Lily.

list.name: Ubiquity Net
list.desc: A friend of Sango's used Kamuna Onmyoudou in a fit of inspiration to create this convenient little gadget. It is not powerful enough to capture criminals, but with a little aim, capturing little animals should be a cinch.

list.name: Omni-Ubiquity Net
list.desc: A net that has been modified once again by Wakamurasaki using onmyoudou. She claims that it can detain the essence of small creatures before using the net itself as a medium to recreate their forms.

list.name: "Pile 'Em Up"
list.desc: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.

list.name: Cecilia Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Cecilia.

list.name: "A Messenger in the Summer Woods"
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making "A Messenger in the Summer Woods."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: "A Guide in the Summer Woods"
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making "A Guide in the Summer Woods."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Philosophies of Light
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though they must live forever on the earth, humanity will always reach for the light. Mortals will pursue and surpass, and they will never stop. A sealed eternity may, perhaps, look magnificent, but its essence is death.

list.name: Guide to Light
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though the sun rays themselves should be blocked by layers upon layers of clouds, there are still those in the thunder god's land who dream of piercing that wrathful sea of lightning to pursue the glory of the divine, fearing not that they shall be cruelly struck down.

list.name: Teachings of Light
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
The ruler who claims to have perceived all forever aims to hoard celestial glory. But this vision that cannot be shared only leads people to long for it more fiercely, like moths diving into the flame.

list.name: A Stunning Stratagem
list.desc: Sangonomiya Kokomi's specialty. The egg is wrapped up almost like a package, and the fish tail at the end is both small and very cute. It really makes you wonder what's inside the package, but at the same time, you can't bear to eat such a beautiful-looking thing... You glance at the crystal-clear smile in Kokomi's eyes. Ah, darn it, you've fallen for her trick, haven't you?

list.name: Adepti Seeker's Stove
list.desc:
A portable stove that can be quickly set up for cooking in the environment. If you enter into combat nearby, it will be destroyed.
Liyue's terrain is vast, varied, and at times even inhospitable — and yet all its inhabitants share a love of good food. These two phenomena would not be able to coexist were it not for portable cooking equipment like this. Whether you are scaling the heights of Jueyun Karst or exploring the islets of Guyun Stone Forest, bringing a portable stove means that a delicious and freshly cooked hot meal is always available at a moment's notice.

list.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
list.desc:
A small and special Seelie, particularly sensitive to the presence of Iron Coins.
A companion entrusted to you by Ulman. Seelie are naturally inclined to guide people, though this Seelie seems weaker than usual, and possesses a remarkable obsession with Iron Coins...

list.name: Small Lamp Grass Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Small Lamp Grass.

list.name: Valley Weaver
list.desc:
Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
This variety originally grew in dark, damp locations. It is known for its profusion of petals, densely packed stamens, and powerful scent.

list.name: Valley Weaver Essential Oil
list.desc: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an intense scent.

list.name: Mountain of Festive Gifts
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Mountain of Festive Gifts.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Shiki Koshou
list.desc:
A gift from Shiki Taishou: a replica armed with spiritual power.

Though Shiki Koshou is incapable of charm magic, it is in contact with Shiki Taishou at all times and can share all that it has seen and heard with him, so it's almost like you've still got Shiki Taishou with you on your journey.

list.name: Fortune Slip
list.desc:
A special slip of paper that can illuminate one's fortune. Also known to a certain someone as "strips of paper."
You can only get one of these per day, which will cause the previous day's fortune slip to lose meaning and disappear.
They say that slips that portend ill luck such as "Misfortune" and "Great Misfortune" can be tied to the Fortune Slip Hanger as a prayer for a turnaround.
Regardless, "fate" and "destiny" are things best grasped and forged in one's own hands.

list.name: Ritual Shrine
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Ritual Shrine.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Fatui Code Sheet
list.desc:
A certain ever-somnolent member of the Shuumatsuban wrote this Fatui Code Sheet.
Reading it does not merely let you know that "these Fatui speak very oddly indeed" — you can also feel the recorder's intense lethargy penetrating the paper in the form of saliva.

list.name: Philosophies of Resistance
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

list.name: Guide to Resistance
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

list.name: Teachings of Resistance
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

list.name: "Pure Gorgeous Summer"
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making "Pure Gorgeous Summer."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: "Warmth"
list.desc: Thoma's specialty. The intricate appearance of this dish belies the simple ingredients used. But take a sip, and Thoma's sunshine smile comes straight to mind. Perhaps this is his special ability: warming the hearts of others using the simplest of ingredients.

list.name: "Final Instructions"
list.desc: Fatui operational orders that you obtained from Lyudochka. They detail an operation that will take place in the future on Watatsumi Island. This intelligence is very important — peoples' lives are at stake here!

list.name: Komore Teahouse Invitation Letter
list.desc: Whomsoever has this invitation letter may enter Komore Teahouse. It has the seal of the Yashiro Commission on it.

list.name: Woodland Dream
list.desc: Albedo's specialty. The fruits and vegetables are laid out like grass, and they stand tall like trees. In this miniature world-in-a-plate, you circle the mottled city wall, follow brown alleys, and enter the light orange castle. A sweet, tender taste then bursts forth like a blooming flower. You open your eyes. There is a smile in the white-haired prince's eyes.

list.name: Philosophies of Transience
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

list.name: Guide to Transience
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
We find the greatest joys in mortal life in transient dreams, for is life itself not like the shadow of the thunder? Pursue your dreams into the clouds if you wish, and enjoy the unexpected silence of the dim lamp-lit nights.

list.name: Teachings of Transience
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
Fleeting glories are the highest expression of mortal beauty, for are we mortals not like the flashing lightning itself? Like a lovely dream or blossoming spark, we shall leave a gorgeous mark on the eternal night sky.

list.name: Sea Ganoderma Cutting
list.desc: A cutting obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality cutting full of life, just waiting to be planted in the Realm Within's fields. After some time it will grow into a Sea Ganoderma.

list.name: Seagrass Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Seagrass.

list.name: Qingxin Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Qingxin.

list.name: Picture Commemorating Seirai Island
list.desc: A picture of some place on Seirai Island. Who knows why it would be buried here...

list.name: Picture Commemorating Seirai Island (III)
list.desc: A picture you got from Mr. Oda Tarou, it seems to show some place on Seirai Island...

list.name: Picture Commemorating Seirai Island (II)
list.desc: A picture you got from Mr. Oda Tarou, it seems to show some place on Seirai Island...

list.name: Picture Commemorating Seirai Island (IV)
list.desc: A picture you got from Mr. Oda Tarou, it seems to show some place on Seirai Island...

list.name: Alkahest
list.desc:
Specialized refinement material for the Cinnabar Spindle.
A silver substance shining with an otherworldly light that is a deadly corrosive poison to things of this world. And yet it also has the power to sublimate matter...

list.name: Launch Tube
list.desc: A special device created by the artisan Pengyi. It comes with functions that allow for the creation and automated launch of fireworks. In the hands of someone creative, it will surely see great use in the creation of unique and radiant fireworks shows.

list.name: "Ballad-Spinning Windwheel"
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Ballad-Spinning Windwheel.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Mr. Cyclops Action Figure
list.desc: A "Mr. Cyclops" toy that Childe had specially-made for Teucer. It even has the lad's name on it.

list.name: "Margaret"
list.desc: Margaret's refreshing signature cocktail, popular among those who only want one drink. It also uses dandelions, but the greatest difference between this and dandelion wine is the price.

list.name: Glaze Lily Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Glaze Lily.

list.name: Violetgrass Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Violetgrass.

list.name: Sweet Flower Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Sweet Flower.

list.name: Memento Lens
list.desc:
A mysterious lens. If you view small fox statues with this lens, you can find things that were not there before.
They say that in the distant past, the legendary Kitsune Saiguu left a catalyst for the then-Hiiragi Clan head, Hiroshi, as a tool to be used in exorcisms.
The Hiiragis would have a special Kamera made to order from overseas with that catalyst mounted on its lens assembly, before giving it back to the Grand Narukami Shrine as a symbol of their friendship.

list.name: Radish Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Radish.

list.name: "The Visible Winds"
list.desc:
Specialized refinement material for the Windblume Ode.
An intricately-made ornament that symbolizes the windmills and windblumes, and is that which adorns the limbs of the Windblume Ode. The wind is invisible and intangible, but the windmills that keep turning and the swaying flowers in the emerald fields are "the visible winds" that show people that the breeze will always care for all life in Mondstadt.

list.name: Bedrock Key Location Diagram
list.desc: A simple diagram that Zhiqiong drew in haste. It indicates the general locations of several Bedrock Keys.

list.name: Kamuijima Cannon Map
list.desc: A map that records the positions of the Kamuijima Cannons.

list.name: "Fragments of Innocence"
list.desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Dodoco Tales."
Pages scattered on the wind. Each one is filled to the brim with childlike wonder, and their dimensions are an exact match for "Dodoco Tales." The abundant innocence and pure love therein will never fade, and just like the never-ending adventure in the book — this passionate fairy tale shall forever soar in the wake of the author's footsteps.

list.name: Sugar-Frosted Slime
list.desc:
A truly exquisite sweet treat that came to a certain someone in a dream. This dream was made a reality through someone else's hard work and, of course, a healthy dose of boom shaka-laka.
Surely this is a gift fit for someone who belongs to the upper echelons of society.

list.name: Philosophies of Prosperity
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

list.name: Guide to Prosperity
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

list.name: Teachings of Prosperity
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

list.name: "Snow on the Hearth"
list.desc: Kamisato Ayaka's specialty. This is almost like a small, lovely, and intricate artwork, with its pale red outer coat covering the feelings that the young maiden began to harbor from that moment on. If one had the honor of enjoy such a treat while having tea with a princess as graceful and noble as a white heron, one would surely yearn to have that moment stretch into eternity.

list.name: Jueyun Chili Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Jueyun Chilis.

list.name: Fate's Yearning
list.desc:
Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
In the past, this strain would grow among cloud-ringed peaks. It is a reclusive species, and has a subtle yet enduring scent.

list.name: Fate's Yearning Essential Oil
list.desc: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an elegant scent.

list.name: Fate's Yearning Perfume
list.desc:
A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.
It releases a fragrance as elegant as the elusive, smoky mountain mist. One hears that it is a favorite of mature women.

list.name: "Sweet Dream"
list.desc: Xiao's specialty. His dream is very simple, and it is merely a lovely dream.

list.name: Carrot Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Carrot.

list.name: "My Way"
list.desc: Yanfei's specialty is Crab Roe Tofu done to an incredible degree of regularity. Its dimensions and flavor are all faithfully rendered according to the "Crab Roe Tofu Laws" in the recipe, with not a single letter omitted.

list.name: Philosophies of Freedom
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

list.name: Guide to Freedom
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

list.name: Teachings of Freedom
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

list.name: Lotus Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Lotus Head.

list.name: Valberry Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Valberries.

list.name: "Once Upon a Time in Mondstadt"
list.desc: Diluc's specialty. Feast your eyes and then your stomach upon this delicacy as the soft ribs melt in your mouth. Who knew Diluc was able to cook this well?

list.name: "A Bloatty Floatty's Dream of the Sky"
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/"A Bloatty Floatty's Dream of the Sky"_icon.png
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making "A Bloatty Floatty's Dream of the Sky."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Hakuen Michimitsu Amenoma
list.desc:
The heirloom blade of the Iwakura Clan.
Although the one who forged this blade possessed great skills, and though it is true that this sword has slain many a foe, it does not possess any special powers. Nor has the Iwakura Succession ever obtained a Vision. Their excellent swordsmanship was purely a result of their honing of mind, body, and technique.
This blade has been submerged in water for a long time and seems to have completely rusted.

list.name: Mint Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Mint.

list.name: Mushroom Spore
list.desc: A spore obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality spore full of life, just waiting to be planted in the Realm Within's fields. After some time it will grow into a Mushroom.

list.name: The Jade Mystery's Affidavit
list.desc: A written affidavit from The Jade Mystery.

list.name: Philosophies of Ballad
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

list.name: Guide to Ballad
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

list.name: Teachings of Ballad
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

list.name: "Feather-Light Praise"
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making "Feather-Light Praise."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Golden House Maiden
list.desc:
Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
This species originally grew under complex hydrological conditions. Its foliage is abundant, its leaves are evergreen, and its stamen is as fair as a Golden House Maiden.

list.name: Golden House Maiden Essential Oil
list.desc: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off a sweet scent.

list.name: Snapdragon Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Snapdragon.

list.name: Ward
list.desc:
A ward retrieved from within the kitsune-shaped sculpture within the abandoned shrine north of Konda Village.
According to Kazari, these wards are required to conduct rites of purification.

list.name: Naganohara Fireworks Note
list.desc:
A note that Yoimiya gave you to record firework formulae with. If you give this note to Yoimiya, she will be able to make fireworks just as you remember them.
No matter how time passes, or people and things change, so long as you take care of this note, you will stand guard over a door to the past. Perhaps you too will find happiness that belongs only to you under a firework-filled sky.

list.name: Silk Flower Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Silk Flowers.

list.name: Quiet Elegance
list.desc: Kamisato Ayato's specialty. The arrangement is exquisite and elegant, much like the manner in which Ayato handles all his affairs. Any more, and it would have been excessive. Any less, and it would have proved a sight squandered. As you sample the dish, you find that its flavor is identical to that of Uyuu Restaurant's — amazing. But as you reach your chopsticks for that crystalline camellia, Ayato stops you... "That was something I made during sword practice. It's just a decoration."

list.name: Windwheel Aster Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Windwheel Aster.

list.name: Philosophies of Elegance
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance abhors vulgarity, and the elegant ever walk alone. Resisting base evils, unmoved by base loves, never taking refuge in base ignorance — that is how one perceives the chasm between the elegant and the contemptuous.

list.name: Guide to Elegance
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance shuns arrogance. The elegant are ever humble, and only by discarding vanity and sloth may one see clearly — and is there not beauty and loveliness even in the basest of appearances?

list.name: Teachings of Elegance
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance brooks no flattery, and the elegant are ever noble. They are like the sea eagles who soar on high to contend with the resounding storms. They will not cater to philistine vulgarity, as one would not cast a flower crown into the mud, staining its dignity.

list.name: Horsetail Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into Horsetail.

list.name: Philosophies of Gold
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

list.name: Guide to Gold
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted into gold, and gold into prosperity.

list.name: Teachings of Gold
list.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the blood that flows deep within Liyue's veins, the muscle that makes up Liyue's beating heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.

list.name: Family Letter
list.desc: The page has already yellowed and become incredibly brittle. A single touch might break it.

list.name: A Set of Cannonballs
list.desc:
Cannonballs for the Mountainator, also known as the Safe Blasting Mechanism 2156. Although you used the Lumenstone Adjuvant to clear the unknown pollutants away, there is still a stench about them that can be detected even while covering your nose.
Ugh. Do you really have to touch it?

list.name: A Bag of Mora
list.desc: Funds provided by Childe. The clinking of the coins within lifts a person's spirits.

list.name: A Bag of Beans
list.desc:
Beans you got from Sango. Arataki Itto seems to be allergic to beans, so these may prove to be useful tools in stopping him from resisting too much.
Sango says they're not free, though. Hopefully they don't cost too much...

list.name: The Meaning of Aeons
list.desc:
A small piece of headgear obtained once the dust settled in the Plane of Euthymia.
One thought may end all calamity, and there will always be thoughts that may transcend time.
Amid all this, one wonders if Makoto's true meaning was successfully communicated or not.

list.name: Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish
list.desc: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.

list.name: Tricolor Dango
list.desc: A soft, glutinous snack. Glutinous rice has been ground into powder and rolled into a ball before being steamed. The Sakura Bloom and Snapdragon colors lend an extra liveliness to these dango.

list.name: Adeptus Gate
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Adeptus Gate.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Ominous Mask
list.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

list.name: Along with Divinity: Prologue
list.desc:
"Have you ever thought about what our lives would've been like without the archons?"
Come and join the author in an exploration of "divinity" with humor and logic.

list.name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (I)
list.desc: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the social structure and characteristics of the hilichurls.

list.name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (III)
list.desc: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features mysterious hilichurls who live apart from the others.

list.name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (II)
list.desc: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the beliefs and spiritual world of the hilichurls.

list.name: Hilichurl Cultural Customs (IV)
list.desc: It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume explores the diverse cultural customs of the hilichurls in relation to Mondstadt's.

list.name: Hilichurl Ballad Selection (I)
list.desc: The masterpiece of the Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian! Scholar Jacob Musk will show you the mysterious spiritual world of the hilichurls through this poetry collection!

list.name: Hilichurl Ballad Selection (II)
list.desc: Are wine and poetry a part of the hilichurl lifestyle? Do they have pure and devout desires? Expert on the hilichurls, Jacob Musk, is here to answer!

list.name: Hilichurl Horned Pot
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hilichurl Horned Pot.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Hilichurl Archery Target
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hilichurl Archery Target.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Hilichurl Straw Hut
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hilichurl Straw Hut.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Hilichurl Spiral Watchtower
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hilichurl Spiral Watchtower.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Hilichurl Ballad: Narrative Draft
list.desc: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Stirring Narrative is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

list.name: Hilichurl Ballad: Lyrical Draft
list.desc: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Elegant Lyric Poem is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

list.name: Hilichurl Ballad: Recital Draft
list.desc: A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Recital of Friendship is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...

list.name: Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian
list.desc: A handbook of Hilichurlian written by the folklorist Ella Musk, though its practical use has yet to be tested in the field.

list.name: Dvalin's Claw
list.desc:
A claw from the Dragon of the East.
It once contained the shadow dragon Durin's vile poison, having torn through the latter's flesh in battle. Thanks to your purification and healing, it is no longer toxic.

list.name: Dvalin's Plume
list.desc:
A feather from the tail of the Dragon of the East.
As a dragon's feather it has experienced more than a thousand years' worth of winds. One senses within it a yearning for freedom so strong that it could whip up a light breeze to rescue it from its current confines. Its former owner's recognition of you is what makes it content to stay in your hands.

list.name: Dvalin's Sigh
list.desc:
A bit of power taken from the whirlwinds evoked by the Dragon of the East.
Beautiful and transparent, both trade winds and tornadoes will work in his name. The winds move as his companion, his voice, and his freedom.
His enemies are the thousands who stand against the wind.

list.name: Rigorous Schedule
list.desc: A schedule that you created for Ningguang. The various items are all laid out in a clear and easy-to-read manner.

list.name: Zhongyuan Chop Suey
list.desc: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is not actually a swear word in the local language.

list.name: Bountiful Year
list.desc: Luxurious and exquisite raw fish. The fish is sliced thinly and arranged in the shape of a flower before a ring of side dishes is set all around it. Normally, the side dishes will be mixed with the raw fish according to one's taste before consumption — this act is said to ensure that things will be smooth sailing in the coming days.

list.name: Tri-Flavored Skewer
list.desc: A pieced-together skewer. Three different cooking processes can be tasted at a go in this dish, which has made it very popular. If you are ever at a loss at to what to pair with some wine, there's no going wrong with one of these.

list.name: Udon Noodles
list.desc: Highly springy noodles. After several rounds of rising and pulling, the result is silky smooth yet springy noodles. Unlike ramen, which prizes dense flavors, udon noodles use light flavors to heal the Inazuman soul.

list.name: Kujou Kamaji's Letter
list.desc: Kujou Kamaji asked you to carry this letter that he personally penned to Hiiragi Chisato. According to him, this one was the best-worded of the lot.

list.name: Qiankun Mora Meat
list.desc: Ningguang's specialty. The pastry is perfectly soft and waxy, as is the consistency of the meat, and the honey-like meat juices ooze out as you squeeze it. Wherever did the high and mighty Tianquan Lady Ningguang learn to make this dish?

list.name: Yun Jin's Personal Letter
list.desc: A letter that Yun Jin personally wrote to Shiyun. It seems to hold the key to turning the situation around.

list.name: Cloud-Shrouded Jade
list.desc: Yun Jin's specialty. This sweet and sticky snack will somehow not affect your throat in any negative way, which is why it's Yun Jin's favorite. The aftertaste is most elegant, not something one would get sick of quickly. Come to think of it... This is quite a decent bit more than she would usually make for herself — but who are you to question her kindness?

list.name: Five Pickled Treasures
list.desc: Pickled vegetables. A round of fermentation makes food richer and also allows it to keep for longer. There were originally only four "treasures," but for auspiciousness' sake, the four vegetables were mixed and plated up with one additional "treasure" added in, hence the name "Five Pickled Treasures."

list.name: Ioroi's Ward
list.desc:
A ward given to you by the bake-danuki Ioroi as a sign of thanks. It is shaped like a lovely comb.
Ioroi once stole this comb to lure "that sneaky kitsune" out. As punishment, Ioroi and his companions were sealed into graven stone by "that dratted fellow."
According to Kazari, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

list.name: Princess Mina of the Fallen Nation (I)
list.desc:
The princess who was prophesied to bring destruction witnesses the imminent fall of her nation, and it is at this moment when a wandering warrior descends from the skies, ignorant of the truth.
The pair's journey amidst the fires of an ancient warring period are about to begin!

list.name: Princess Mina of the Fallen Nation (III)
list.desc:
The two, who have entered the field of battle, finally witness the true Avici. The truth behind the fires of war that have swept across the world will be revealed here!
This volume comes with some super value-added extras!

list.name: Princess Mina of the Fallen Nation (II)
list.desc:
"A princess who brings destruction. Hah. Isn't that just an excuse for making war?"
They travel to the center of the world in search of the truth behind the prophecy.
The super-popular romantic adventure continues!

list.name: Princess Mina of the Fallen Nation (V)
list.desc:
"If this world requires your sacrifice to be saved, then it might as well burn."
Having reached the Sky Tower at the heart of the world at last, is this... finally the end of the pair's tale?

list.name: Princess Mina of the Fallen Nation (VI)
list.desc:
The truth of the world is revealed — and what a terrible joke it is! Even when separated, the two cannot escape the chains of fate.
This may be the final volume of "Princess Mina of the Fallen Nation," but our story isn't over yet!

list.name: Princess Mina of the Fallen Nation (IV)
list.desc:
"Go back to hell, you jumped-up vengeful spirit!"
The riveting flashback chapter! What lies within the warrior's buried past?
Here comes a new chapter in the adventures of the princess who lost her nation and the warrior!

list.name: Messy Pile of Fir Crates
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Messy Pile of Fir Crates.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Mixed Yakisoba
list.desc: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. One merely needs to stir-fry the noodles and side dishes evenly before serving, making this an easy-to-make and filling dish. It is no wonder, then, that this dish is so sought after among Inazumans.

list.name: Mask of the One-Horned
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
In the lost songs of the oni nursemaids, Torachiyo was an elegant young man, strong of body and fair of face. He was once a beloved lieutenant of the Shogun, and he followed her into the dark abyssal realms to repel the defiled ones, winning renown for the oni, whose blood thinned with each passing day.
None now sing these songs, but the mask of a horned oni, even in a different form, still possesses power beyond the norm.

list.name: Mask of the Wicked Lieutenant
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Folktales tell that once upon a time, there lived an oni named Torachiyo. Torachiyo was a highly skilled warrior, such that it was once said the Torachiyo might dance amid a thousand blades, juunihitoe robes becoming shredded like falling violet petals, and yet not receive a single wound. Yet this oni would eventually betray the Shogun and revolt, becoming shorn of an arm and a horn in the battle before fleeing and slaying itself in a fit of furious madness.
Hearsay holds that the stubborn oni often hold fear and distress in their hearts. That they should fantasize about eternity yet fear the moment, and are apt to become swallowed by terror or anger is their just reward. This mask depicts Torachiyo, fangs bared.

list.name: Mask of the Tiger's Bite
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
"Sumirezome Sangetsu Kogetsukan" depicts the fierce oni Torachiyo shattering the Shogun's naginata with a single bite, thus gaining the upper hand for a time. As such, masks that are based on him have finely crafted fangs.
In the denouement of this tale, the wounded oni fled into the forest, deathly afraid of showing himself even to the cold moonlight. The wind that whispers through the alleys and valleys can be said to resemble his quiet cries of agony, and so there is a poetic seasonal expression for this in Inazuma: "Torachiyo's Wind."

list.name: Mask of the Kijin
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Chiyo, a warrior of the oni tribe with the Electro Mitsudomoe emblem emblazoned on her back, was once swallowed whole by a beast from beyond this world that had a tiger's body and a serpent's tail while holding back the forces of darkness. At last, she tore the creature's innards apart from within, breaking free.
This is the origin of the phrase "Chiyo the Tiger-Bite," and would be changed over many years to "Torachiyo."
But within the belly of the beast, she was stained by a deep sin and saw her comrades ripped to shreds by those blood-red teeth. Steeped in darkness as far as the eye could see, she would eventually draw her sword upon the Almighty Narukami Ogosho. Her sword-arm and one horn would be cloven, and she would flee from the city into the forest like a wounded beast. There, they say that she was taken for some unknown monster and slain by the tengu, or perhaps by the Shuumatsuban — or perhaps by a scion of the Iwakura Clan training deep in the mountains, for her features had been twisted by hatred and the agony of her wounds. Or perhaps she even met the oni-masked, sword-bearing doll near the corpse of the giant serpent, and there ended her life's journey.
Few among those who fought against the abyss in those days were spared pitch-dark dreams. Those who slew monsters and then became them were hardly the minority. The border between worlds grows fragile, and corruption of this kind is perhaps not merely monodirectional.

list.name: Adeptus' Temptation
list.desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine, in which specially selected ingredients are submerged and slowly boiled in soup stock. The recipe scribbled from memory alone was enough to urge the adepti to once again return to the world of men.

list.name: Nutritious Meal (V.593)
list.desc: Sucrose's specialty. It looks like some strange alchemical product at first, but Sucrose insists that it is a healthy and nutritious meal, the result of many experiments and painstaking improvements. Its healthy green color comes from a mix of cream and natural vegetable juices... Wait, vegetable juices?

list.name: Serene Flames
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making Serene Flames.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: A Love Letter(?)
list.desc: A letter that Hiiragi Chisato has written for Kujou Kamaji. She would be mad if you opened it up without her permission...

list.name: Ballads of the Squire (I)
list.desc: Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's days as a knight's squire.

list.name: Ballads of the Squire (II)
list.desc: Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's friendship with a sword-dancer.

list.name: Records of the Gallant: The Hermit
list.desc: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

list.name: Records of the Gallant: Dust
list.desc: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

list.name: Outrider's Champion Steak!
list.desc: Amber's specialty. One side is obviously uncooked. The other side gives off a subtle scent of something burnt. Close your eyes and have a big mouthful, just to keep Amber happy if nothing else.

list.name: Polarizing Prism
list.desc:
A prism that can bend light.
In the darkness, these prisms can spread thin light into a wider area. Perhaps this is due to this quirk that these prisms can grant a measure of peace to those whose hearts are oft shrouded in darkness.

list.name: Storage Sack: Buzz-Off Bag
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Storage Sack: Buzz-Off Bag.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Light Realm Sigil
list.desc:
A mark symbolizing the recognition of Enkanomiya's Tokoyo Ookami.
They can be offered up to the Statue of the Vassals of Watatsumi, thus upgrading the Bokuso Box.

list.name: Light Realm Core
list.desc:
You discovered this mysterious stone while exploring the darkened realm of Enkanomiya.
The Light Realm gave humans additional means to resist the Abyss.

list.name: Princess's Box
list.desc:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I'm afraid I can't finish the fresco."
"It's been a while since I last saw the blue sky and green grass. I don't know which hues to use to capture the landscape of thawing ice and snow that my father so longs for."
"By the time he comes back, everything will be back to how it was. But I can't take this cold anymore."
"Forgive me, Father. Ukko, I'm sorry you had to see us like this."
"Imunlaukr, I wish I could see you again..."

list.name: Cup of Commons
list.desc:
One of the six lost offerings scattered throughout The Chasm. Neither stone nor gem, it somehow still became part of the Treasure Hoarders' loot hoard.
It has been filled by turns with fine wine, fair treasure, and blood. Now, its previous shame has been washed away, and it is ready to take on new memories.

list.name: Riftborn Regalia
list.desc:
A broken horn that you obtained from defeating the Wolflord. That said, it should not have left anything behind after your hunt.
Even a lord among the Riftwolves is nothing before monsters of a higher pedigree.
"Gold" mass-produced these malformed wolf packs almost as if by accident, like shrunken drawings on discarded sheets of paper, and the horns on this one represent its authority to command its dark brood to dissolve space itself.

list.name: Raw Meat
list.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

list.name: Minty Meat Rolls
list.desc: A sour-and-spicy dish. The marinated meat has been thinly sliced and rolled into the mint leaves, before being brushed with a sauce blend containing Jueyun Chilis. The unique mint flavor adds the finishing touch to this dish, turning it into an excellent addition to any cold platter.

list.name: Tonkotsu Ramen
list.desc: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The meat, prepared at low temperature, is laid over the noodles. Salty, fragrant, delicious soup seeps into each strand. A single bowl of these is guaranteed to restore any tired soul.

list.name: Adventurer's Experience
list.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 5000 EXP.
These experiences are very beneficial for journeys into the unknown.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Sal Terrae
list.desc: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages are littered with a small amount of shiny but bitter salt crystals.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Guyun Stone Forest
list.desc: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, by chance. The pages are damp and seem to have been soaked in water.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Luhua Pool
list.desc: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, at a makeshift camp. It seems to have been dipped in water, with the watermark of a fox's footprint.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Yaoguang Shoal
list.desc: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages smell like the sea breeze.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Ritou
list.desc: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages bear both the refreshing scent of sakura flowers and the bitterness of tobacco leaves.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Aocang Lake, Jueyun Karst
list.desc: A diary of the famed adventurer, Roald, left by the lake. It tells of his plans after his adventures on Mt. Aocang.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingyun Peak, Jueyun Karst
list.desc: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages have the scent of flowers that grow on cliffs.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingce Village
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingce Village_icon.png
list.desc: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, at a makeshift camp. It stills looks new, and smells like the fragrant herbs of Mt. Qingce.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingxu Pool
list.desc: Diary of a renowned adventurer, Roald. Spots of shiny green moss can be seen among the pages.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Tsurumi Island
list.desc: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages bear both the moist smell of the fog and a certain fungal scent.

list.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Dragonspine
list.desc: A journal left behind by a renowned adventurer Roald. Some of its pages are damaged and crumpled, and a few shimmering ice crystals are attached to them.

list.name: Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
list.desc: A nutritious egg dish. Luxurious mayonnaise sits atop a lining of ham and poached egg toast. The smooth mouthfeel fills you with energy for the long road ahead, and is one of the Adventurers' Guild's top-rated breakfasts.

list.name: War Drum: Line-Breaking Reverb
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a War Drum: Line-Breaking Reverb.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Wolfhook Juice
list.desc: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. Iced Wolfhook juice mixed with a pinch of other ingredients, forming a dreamy shade of violet.

list.name: Mist Flower Corolla
list.desc: A flower bud encased in solid ice. Even after being picked, the flower continues to emit cold.

list.name: Cold Cut Platter
list.desc: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.

list.name: Cleansing Heart
list.desc:
A palmful of eternal water left by an oceanid.
Though it has already diffused among the depths of the lake, its purity remains all the same. But why would a creature so pure and clean as an oceanid covet the appearance of a being that roams the land, and assume such a form with pure water? They need not breathe nor do they require sustenance...

list.name: Mint Salad
list.desc: A fragrant salad dish. Finely chopped Jueyun Chilis blended with a sauce and mixed with Mint leaves. It looks like nothing special, but it has surprisingly potent powers of refreshment and reinvigoration. It is also the perfect palate-cleanser after a greasy, indulgent meal.

list.name: Boreal Wolf's Milk Tooth
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius' wolf pack is its blessed honor guard, and even the milk teeth of a wolf cub possess great potential.
In the past, the gods had the responsibility to love all people. Andrius was therefore quite unusual in that he became leader of the wolves, while only welcoming abandoned babies and wanderers when it came to humans.

list.name: Boreal Wolf's Nostalgia
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The Wolf King, believing himself to despise humans, thought himself unable to envision a happy life for humanity, making him unworthy of becoming the Lord of the Winds of the world. Therefore, he chose to disappear. Yet, in truth, he gazes on the ones abandoned by the world ever so gently.

list.name: Boreal Wolf's Broken Fang
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

list.name: Boreal Wolf's Cracked Tooth
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The life of a wolf is not without violence; broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

list.name: Mudra of the Malefic General
list.desc:
A puppet joint obtained from the Plane of Euthymia. The gesture here symbolizes the concept that "one sees and one does."
Even now that "she" has become a calamitous deity, she can still utilize such transcendent gestures, her sword flashing forth as swiftly as her eyes may see.
And yet, as the countless disasters ground on for far too long, the baleful general's shell had to embrace a new spring.

list.name: Let's Go, Dodoco!
list.desc: Message From the Editor: "Let's Go, Dodoco!" is the combined work of an older girl and a younger girl. Every chapter brims with their gentleness and good wishes, as the story is intended as a gift to our readers. I hope this book — in spite of its small volume — can bring you some simple joy after a long day of work.

list.name: History of Kings and Clans: Prologue
list.desc: A comprehensive history of Mondstadt edited and compiled by the Northland History Society.

list.name: Genesis Crystal
list.desc: An energy crystal from the very origin of the universe. Formed from within nothingness out of pure potential and hope, it contains enough energy to create a newborn star.

list.name: Sashimi Platter
list.desc: A seafood dish made using fresh ingredients. The fish and shellfish are cut into pieces and arranged neatly. The slices have an elegant and tender taste, providing rich and high-quality nutrition. The lingering sweet aftertaste is derived fully from the ingredients' freshness, and every bite is an enjoyment worth closing one's eyes and savoring.

list.name: Seed Dispensary
list.desc:
A special container obtained from Madame Ping. According to her, this dispensary has the power to "generate seeds"... That is to say, it can create the seeds of various plants according to their special traits, which can then be planted within the appropriate fields within your Serenitea Pot.
The plants that can be grown are as follows: Silk Flower, Sweet Flower, Cecilia, Glaze Lily, Windwheel Aster, Qingxin, Violetgrass, Valberry, Small Lamp Grass, Jueyun Chili, Carrot, Radish, Mint, Mushroom, Naku Weed, Horsetail, Snapdragon, Lotus Head, Calla Lily, Seagrass, Sea Ganoderma, Harra Fruit, Zaytun Peach, Sumeru Rose.

list.name: Northland Bank Check
list.desc: A check with the emblem of the Northland Bank printed on it. It can be exchanged for Mora.

list.name: Northern Smoked Chicken
list.desc: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A staple for Northerners, often made for honored guests.

list.name: Northern Apple Stew
list.desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.

list.name: Northlander Sword Billet
list.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

list.name: Northlander Claymore Billet
list.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

list.name: Northlander Bow Billet
list.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

list.name: Northlander Catalyst Billet
list.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

list.name: Northlander Polearm Billet
list.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

list.name: Tail of Boreas
list.desc:
A handful of tail scales from the Great Wolf King of the North.
Even without his physical body and beyond death, Boreas still possesses extraordinary powers. He took a form comprised of ice and wind to embrace a new challenge, but even such a form could not house all of his power. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.

list.name: Ring of Boreas
list.desc:
A bit of crystallized ice from the Great Wolf King of the North.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. Though his power may have diminished, he could still freeze the land in an instant.

list.name: Spirit Locket of Boreas
list.desc:
A bit of the Great Wolf King of the North's power drawn from its soul.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. In his final moments, he finally realized the chilling north wind could only extinguish life, not nurture it. Therefore, Boreas let his powers freely flow into the land to protect it and its inhabitants.

list.name: Wonder Core
list.desc: The core component to the Jade Chamber's mechanisms. When combined with Adepti Sigils, they can be used as the control center of the Jade Chamber.

list.name: 1000 Years of Loneliness
list.desc: The beginning of the Springvale Hunter's tragic fantasy journey. Where did misfortune first befall him? What marks the start and finish of the 1000-year journey of loneliness? Let this first volume of 1000 Years of Loneliness be your guide through the fantastical fog that is the life of Gothson.

list.name: Luxurious Toybox
list.desc: A luxurious toybox from Mumu. This was once something they all desired in their childhood. May all wishes come true in the future.

list.name: Sandbearer Wood
list.desc:
Timber from the Sandbearer Tree. Said to be an exceptionally hardy plant resistant to wind and rain with a long lifespan.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Scroll-Shaped Ward
list.desc:
An ancient and mysterious item shaped like a tightly-sealed scroll. No matter what you do, it won't open at all.
According to Kazari, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

list.name: Cabbage
list.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

list.name: Weathered Arrowhead
list.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

list.name: Lighter-Than-Air Pancake
list.desc: Noelle's specialty. These thick pastries are the special afternoon snacks of the Knights of Favonius. They give people the sense that they have fallen upon a layer of fluffy clouds, and seeing Noelle's smile makes the feeling all the sweeter!

list.name: Thick Notebook
list.desc: Notes written by Henry Morton. They describe a place seemingly not far from here.

list.name: "Kokutan" Thick-Walled Clay Water Tank
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a "Kokutan" Thick-Walled Clay Water Tank.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Energy Nectar
list.desc:
A thick and sticky honey that is full of energy.
The Whopperflower hunts by tricking its prey, a process it uses to possibly evolve into a more powerful and pure form.

list.name: NRE (Menu 30)
list.desc: A handy meal-in-a-pouch that can transform most foods into instantly absorbable nutritional matter. Despite the fact that it can greatly increase the efficiency of nutritional intake, most knights aren't too keen to put their food in it...

list.name: Parametric Transformer
list.desc:
A device that can transmute materials placed within and convert it into some other material.
·During the transmutation process, you must use Elemental Attacks to generate enough energy for the transmutation to take place.
·After obtaining the transmuted materials, you must wait seven days to use it once again.

This mysterious device, discovered within the ruins, has the power to accelerate cycles and "transmute" material objects. Generally speaking, everything is undergoing a cycle. Memories and elements surge within the ley lines, rotten fallen fruits return to the soil, and the trees born from the soil will one day bear their crystalline fruit...

list.name: Luminescent Spine
list.desc: The light-emitting part of a firefly. Used for courtship, and in medicine to help recover strength.

list.name: Portable Waypoint
list.desc:
Use this to create a temporary Teleport Waypoint at your current location. Only one can exist at a time.
A pocket-sized item that creates a temporary Teleport Waypoint. It is capable of connecting with the ley lines, at least to the extent necessary to bring about teleportation.
Although it offers an incredible convenience to Vision bearers, the actual principles behind Teleport Waypoints are not yet fully understood. We can only hope that using them does not cause any undesirable side effects...

list.name: First Apprentice of Guhua
list.desc: A novel by Chang the Ninth. Its thickness and weight say much about the effort he put in.

list.name: Wall Corner: Fragrant Nook
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Wall Corner: Fragrant Nook.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Perimeter Wall: Scenic Archway
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Perimeter Wall: Scenic Archway.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Scenic Corridor: Sylvan Stroll
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Scenic Corridor: Sylvan Stroll.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Main Entrance: Gateway to the Clouds
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Main Entrance: Gateway to the Clouds.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Courtyard Wall: Spring and Autumn Splendor
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Courtyard Wall: Spring and Autumn Splendor.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Courtyard Wall: All in a Row
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Courtyard Wall: All in a Row.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Courtyard Wall: Peace Across
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Courtyard Wall: Peace Across.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Biography of Gunnhildr
list.desc: A history book on the life of the apical ancestor of the Gunnhildr Clan compiled by Eckhart Gunnhildr, a modern historian of Mondstadt. It consists of fragmented stories and legends from the aristocratic period.

list.name: Replica Ancient Otogi Crate
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Replica Ancient Otogi Crate.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Replica Ancient Otogi Keg
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Replica Ancient Otogi Keg.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part I
list.desc:
An investigation journal found in front of the ruins with a circular entrance.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

list.name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part III
list.desc:
An investigation journal found in the camp on the sunny side of Dragonspine.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

list.name: Ancient Investigation Journal: Part II
list.desc:
An investigation journal found in the basement of the ice-covered ruins.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

list.name: Slime Condensate
list.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

list.name: Slime Concentrate
list.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.

list.name: Slime Secretions
list.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

list.name: Warrior's Spear
list.desc:
One of the six lost offerings scattered throughout The Chasm. It was lost amid the ancient battlefield five hundred years ago. The long years have worn the edge of the spear-point away, but it still looks quite ominous nonetheless.
One can imagine that it was once wielded by a warrior most brave, earning the cheers of the young wherever it swept, even unto The Chasm itself.

list.name: Famed Handguard
list.desc:
An intricately-made handguard that was mounted upon a famed weapon.
Some believe that swords have souls and lives of their own, and thus deserve their own names. Those who love their blades will be acknowledged by them in turn. But those who see their swords as friends or even lovers should be warned that this relationship is built on death and bloodshed. The passions of those who dance with their blade amid crimson showers must surely be cooled someday by fickle steel.

list.name: Tusk of Monoceros Caeli
list.desc:
The horn of a whale that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is said that the shape of one's constellation determines one's character. The image of a whale cruising across the celestial heights represents a solipsism that seeks to crush and devour all in its path.
Embracing this aspect of himself, Childe gleefully summoned one such beast before throwing himself into battle against you.

list.name: Miso Soup
list.desc: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The ingredients used here are very common and it is made simply, but this small bowl of soup has the power to ensure that you shall not grow weary on your journey, even if you travel on foot.

list.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

list.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

list.name: Shivada Jade Fragment
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."

list.name: Shivada Jade Sliver
list.desc: Character Ascension Material.

list.name: The Saga of Hamavaran (I)
list.desc: "How could this happen..." An ordinary scholar from Sumeru is unexpectedly assigned an unpopular specialization and ordered to go forth to the land of thunder and lightning... The curtains slowly rise on an adventure in the nation of many shores!

list.name: The Saga of Hamavaran (II)
list.desc: "'Ghost-calling'? Is that the same as 'spirit-warding' back home?" With confusing questions swirling in his mind, Hamavaran begins to speak with his newfound traveling companion. An unexpected journey begins!

list.name: The Saga of Hamavaran (Preface)
list.desc: The prefaces of the new light novel "The Saga of Hamavaran," now combined into their own separate volume due to a business model adjustment!

list.name: Calla Lily
list.desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

list.name: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
list.desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.

list.name: Universal Peace
list.desc: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.

list.name: Dango Milk
list.desc:
A creative snack made by adding sticky dango to milk. It is sweet and has a dense mouthfeel. All the customers who have tried it love it.
Still, it is dango that's been added in — drink too much and you might lose your appetite.

list.name: Diagram: Adepti Seeker's Stove
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Adepti Seeker's Stove. Learn it and you can create a portable stove to bring with you on your travels.

list.name: Diagram: NRE (Menu 30)
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Nutrition, Ready-to-Eat (NRE) meal-in-a-pouch. Learn it and you can create a tool that makes ingesting food much quicker.

list.name: Diagram: Kitain Cross Spear
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Kitain Cross Spear (Polearm).

list.name: Diagram: Geo Treasure Compass
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Geo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Liyue.

list.name: Diagram: Wind Catcher
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Wind Catcher. A Wind Catcher can absorb the energy of Anemograna and release it when needed to create a wind current.

list.name: Diagram: Warming Bottle
list.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Warming Bottle. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to resist Sheer Cold.

list.name: Diagram: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
list.desc: Someone from Tatarasuna left this diagram of Katsuragikiri Nagamasa behind. You can use it to master the art of making this Claymore.

list.name: Diagram: Hamayumi
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Hamayumi.

list.name: Diagram: Anemo Treasure Compass
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Anemo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Mondstadt.

list.name: Diagram: Dragonspine Spear
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dragonspine Spear (Polearm).

list.name: Potato
list.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

list.name: Holy Water
list.desc: A bottle of clear, colorless, and contaminant-free liquid. Indistinguishable from ordinary spring water. May or may not be worth putting all of one's hopes into.

list.name: Ley Line Sprout
list.desc: It is said that there was a great tree whose roots once spread out to every corner of the world, and this branch is said to be part of it. It is almost if it was never broken off and taken far away, for its vitality is such that it still sprouts new leaves even now.

list.name: Dead Ley Line Branch
list.desc: Fragile branches from deep within the earth. Even after years of aging, from beneath it's mottled surface you can see that its power is not yet entirely lost.

list.name: Dead Ley Line Leaves
list.desc: A twig from deep within the earth. Though it is far from where it once lay, its leaves still pulsate with energy.

list.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

list.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

list.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

list.name: Prithiva Topaz Sliver
list.desc: Character Ascension Material.

list.name: Fragrant Cedar Wood
list.desc:
Wood from the Cedar tree. Also known as the "Fragrant Cedar" for the aromatic oils it contains.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Estate Storehouse: We Have Reserves
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Storehouse: We Have Reserves.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Estate Reception: Prim and Proper
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Reception: Prim and Proper.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Estate Wall Corner: Old City Palisade
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Wall Corner: Old City Palisade.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Estate Gate: Windy Doors
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Gate: Windy Doors.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Estate Courtyard Corner: Measured Harmony
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Courtyard Corner: Measured Harmony.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Estate Corridor: Onward With Ease
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Corridor: Onward With Ease.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Estate Courtyard Wall: Stoneguard
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Courtyard Wall: Stoneguard.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Estate Courtyard Wall: Hidden Boundary
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Courtyard Wall: Hidden Boundary.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Estate Courtyard Wall: Harmonious Corner
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Courtyard Wall: Harmonious Corner.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Bacon
list.desc: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

list.name: Lavender Melon
list.desc: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

list.name: Cecilia
list.desc: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

list.name: Sergeant's Insignia
list.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

list.name: Husk Gem
list.desc: A jewel that fell from the armor of a special Shadowy Husk after you defeated it. You can feel a will surging within it. Perhaps it might be more correct to say that this will manifested itself through the armor rather than manipulated it.

list.name: Summer Festival Fish
