list.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

list.name: Records of Jueyun: Mountain Spirits
list.desc: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment features the stories of Seelie living in the mountains.

list.name: Records of Jueyun: Wuwang
list.desc: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the origin of Wuwang Hill.

list.name: Records of Jueyun: Palace Beneath the Sea
list.desc: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on ancient fictional stories.

list.name: Records of Jueyun: Hidden Jade
list.desc: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the Dunyu Ruins.

list.name: Records of Jueyun: Stone Beasts
list.desc: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the legends of stone beasts.

list.name: Records of Jueyun: Qilin
list.desc: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the shared history of qilins and humans.

list.name: Jueyun Guoba
list.desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Stir-fried ham and Jueyun Chili sprinkled on a crispy crust made from Rice and Horsetail create a refined, meaty snack that transforms humble Rice into a hot delicacy.

list.name: Survival Grilled Fish
list.desc: Keqing's specialty. This dish was not grilled. Instead, it was fried from within through the delicate application of Electro. A gentle bite reveals fragrant fish under the lightly charred skin, its taste perfectly balanced. So, is this how she survives in the wild? You really can't judge a book by its cover.

list.name: Definitely Not Bar Food!
list.desc: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!

list.name: Insulation Potion
list.desc:
A potion that boosts Electro RES and keeps one from getting electro-shocked.
Induces a tingling sensation when drank. It is said to work by filling the body with inversely charged electrical energy, which counteracts the effect of Electro damage.

list.name: Sakura Tempura
list.desc: A dish deep-fried in oil. Incorporate the marinated sakura blossom petals into the batter before giving the fresh shrimp and vegetables an even coating, frying, and then draining the oil. This all sounds simple enough, but good tempura making is not something achieved in a mere day.

list.name: Sakura Bloom
list.desc: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

list.name: Sakura Shrimp Crackers
list.desc: Crispy, crunchy crackers. Potatoes are ground into flour and added to Shrimp and Sakura Blooms before being baked in an oven. It possesses a lovely flavor profile for a snack and is beloved by people of all ages, traits that have made it a popular choice of gift.

list.name: Sakura Mochi
list.desc: A delicate and elegant snack. The dark green leaf adds complexity to the overall warm color palette. Just looking at it gives you a sense of its quiet beauty. 'Tis a shame that its lovely flavor is like a blooming flower in its transience — yet do not let that dissuade you from taking a bite.

list.name: Crimson Agate
list.desc: A type of crystal formed from the combination of concentrated life force with an energy unique to Dragonspine. Makes for an ideal nutrient for growing Frostbearing Trees.

list.name: Rope
list.desc: Rope obtained from a Treasure Hoarder camp. You can use it for repairs.

list.name: Viktor's Gift
list.desc: A gift you got from Viktor. He seems to have also put a letter under the gift box.

list.name: Of Fields Green: Clear Spring Fountain
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making Of Fields Green: Clear Spring Fountain.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Delicious "Pile 'Em Up"
list.desc: A rich, meaty dish. Piled in just the right way to be both aesthetically pleasing and delicious all the way through. I wonder if we can pile it a little higher...

list.name: Delicious Tricolor Dango
list.desc: A soft, glutinous snack. The luster of these dango is like the falling morning dew, and it gives off the feeling of lush flowers and branches. When watching the flowers, eating this snack gives one a sense of happiness, as if the whole following year shall be as gorgeous as the falling flowers before them.

list.name: Delicious Zhongyuan Chop Suey
list.desc: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. The authentic "Liyue taste" of this aromatic dish makes it a comfort food for golden-agers that may bring a tear to their eyes.

list.name: Delicious Bountiful Year
list.desc: Luxurious and exquisite raw fish. The stacked raw fish is sliced as thin as cicada wings, and their taste is as light as mist, their pattern lines opal-white, like snow kissing the earth. One can hardly wait to dig in — the soft and smooth meat and myriad condiment flavors coalesce on the tongue, to the praise of all. Truly, this is the flavor experience to top them all!

list.name: Delicious Tri-Flavored Skewer
list.desc: A pieced-together skewer. The highly-refined temperature control has released sizzling blooms of oils. The many seasonings accentuate the flavor of the various ingredients. If there was but a little less of them, it would be too plain; if a little more, too dense. This keen balance reveals the craftsman's heart within the chef.

list.name: Delicious Udon Noodles
list.desc: Highly springy noodles. The snow-white, soft yet elastic udon, and the elegantly flavored soup combine to make a simple but comforting dish. The faintest scent of wheat may eventually travel down into your belly together with the sweet noodles, but the aftertaste of warmth will remain.

list.name: Delicious Five Pickled Treasures
list.desc: Pickled vegetables. The fermentation process has added a layer of flavor to the natural sweetness of the ingredients. The crispy texture is a real highlight, and it spices up rice and wine alike exceptionally. A treasure indeed!

list.name: Delicious Mixed Yakisoba
list.desc: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. Some mysterious art of seasoning has been imparted upon the slightly curled noodles and ordinary side dishes. Smooth, springy, rich... the magic at work on the plate is such that one will never tire of cleaning it out.

list.name: Delicious Adeptus' Temptation
list.desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. This dish is a rare and exquisite mix of both land and sea, combining countless delicious delicacies in one flavor-filled pot. Each mouthful is a moment to remember — it's even irresistible enough to entice the adepti down from their celestial abode.

list.name: Delicious Minty Meat Rolls
list.desc: A sour-and-spicy dish. The meat and mint are in exquisite equilibrium, tender and not greasy, delicate and not bitter. The spiciness awakens the twain's poetic balance with startling clarity as it leaps in your mouth, only to close with a sigh of perfection.

list.name: Delicious Tonkotsu Ramen
list.desc: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The springy noodles have absorbed the essence of the soup, and the accoutrements have added all manner of variation to the mouthfeel. The soup has preserved the strong fragrance of the bones used to make it, yet goes down gently without that greasy feeling. Before you know it, the bowl's all gone, and you've still got room for more.

list.name: Delicious Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
list.desc: A nutritious egg dish. The mayonnaise rises like the sun over the rippling poached egg's surface, and the exquisite mouthfeel really hits the spot. The unique salty flavor of the ham cuts right through the mix as well, like light parting the gathered clouds.

list.name: Delicious Cold Cut Platter
list.desc: A plate of cold cut meat. The seasoning is just delightful enough to bring out the flavors perfectly. With a mouth full of meaty ecstasy, one worries about nothing.

list.name: Delicious Mint Salad
list.desc: A fragrant salad dish. The slightly bitter minty-fresh flavors do not cover the blazing mouthfeel of the Jueyun Chili but instead cause the spiciness to reach new heights. The two whirl and pirouette on your tongue like a pair of contending dancers to the hearty and vigorous applause of all.

list.name: Delicious Sashimi Platter
list.desc: A seafood dish made using fresh ingredients. The plate spread before you is like a work of art, almost too beautiful to shatter. The surpassing knife-work has imparted the greatest mouthfeel upon the ingredients possible. The delicate texture, the exquisite springiness, the natural sweetness... it is like something living is leaping inside your mouth — straight from the ocean and into your heart.

list.name: Delicious Northern Smoked Chicken
list.desc: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A dish fit for a king. Go on, find one and serve him with pride.

list.name: Delicious Northern Apple Stew
list.desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat is juicy in the extreme, and no matter how much of it you eat, you still want more. The way every breath you take is tinged with the flavor of apples reminds you of nothing so much as lying in an apple orchard.

list.name: Delicious Miso Soup
list.desc: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The flavorful soup gives off a leaven fragrance. One mouthful of this with rice will ensure the completeness of the entire meal.

list.name: Delicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
list.desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint, and Calla Lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.

list.name: Delicious Universal Peace
list.desc: Colorful staple food. The sweet-and-sour preserved fruit is bound to the rich mouthfeel of the rice as if by invisible threads. Even after you swallow, the faint fragrance remains on your lips, increasing your sense of satisfaction by an order of magnitude.

list.name: Delicious More-and-More
list.desc: A snack grilled on an iron plate. The rich ingredients have been stacked atop one another. One bite into the crisp outer layer reveals the soft tenderness within. The lovely sauce clothes the condiments luxuriously, flowing between lips and teeth alike en route to the stomach. Even the aroma that lingers in the air has ascended to become part of its unforgettable deliciousness.

list.name: Delicious Tianshu Meat
list.desc: A braised meat dish. Its intense aroma can be detected from miles away. The ingredients look exquisite in every way, capturing the essence of its original design. It would not look out of place on a gourmet spread at Yuehai Pavilion.

list.name: Delicious Sangayaki
list.desc: A simple, humble fisherman's side dish. Full of nutrition and flavor. The lightly charred, yellowed exterior wraps the tender insides — providing two pleasures at once! Fish paste was already quite delectable raw, and the charcoal grilling only makes it better.

list.name: Delicious Noodles with Mountain Delicacies
list.desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The seemingly ordinary noodles have absorbed the essence of the mountainous delicacies. A single mouthful is enough to taste its extreme freshness.

list.name: Delicious Stone Harbor Delicacies
list.desc: Wok-fried vegetarian food. The scents of the earth, the cool shade, and the moistness of the mist have all been enjoined into this plate of freshness. Pair it with simple white rice — both your taste buds and your soul shall experience a down-to-earth satisfaction many times over.

list.name: Delicious Rice Cake Soup
list.desc: Commonly-seen city cuisine. The freshness of light soup forms the perfect backdrop for the original flavor of the ingredients to stand out, giving you that ancient taste of Inazuma City. This back-to-basics cuisine is sure to make you feel warm inside when eaten on a snowy night as you travel alone.

list.name: Delicious Stir-Fried Fish Noodles
list.desc: A main dish with an intense flavor. The sumptuous, fresh look is already enough to leave people salivating, and one bite will surely lead to another. The smooth rice noodles and tender fish grant this meal a seat at any gourmet's table, its pedestrian ingredients notwithstanding.

list.name: Delicious Dry-Braised Salted Fish
list.desc: Dried fish that has been grilled slowly over a charcoal flame. The rich fats ooze out as the fish meets the grill, and with those sizzling sounds, the fish is clothed in a burnished golden coat. The meat is firm but delicious, and the mouthfeel is quite delicate. Such is the unsurpassed gift of the seas.

list.name: Delicious Cured Pork Dry Hotpot
list.desc: A dish fried over a great flame. The rendered fat from the fried ham layers the side dishes perfectly, and the flavors have long permeated the whole dish. Its shine alone is enough to whet one's appetite, and every bite is sure to evoke memories of house, home, and celebration in anyone from Liyue.

list.name: Delicious Tea Break Pancake
list.desc: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.

list.name: Delicious Triple-Layered Consommé
list.desc: A neatly-arranged dish. The evenly-sized threads reveal exquisite knife-work. Rather than a dish, this seems more like a work of art. But once you work up the wherewithal to pick up those chopsticks and have at it, the delicious flavors will be utter bliss — leaving this as a mere work of art would be such a shame.

list.name: Delicious Teyvat Fried Egg
list.desc: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.

list.name: Delicious Mora Meat
list.desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. With a crispy crust and tender meat, this legendary delicacy is so succulent that not even Mora laid in front of you could distract you from enjoying it.

list.name: Delicious Oncidium Tofu
list.desc: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. The tofu, thread-thin as the autumn leaves, floats amidst the bowl, like mist in a forest, and the shredded bamboo shoots give the image a sweet, lustrous sheen, while the broth combines the essence of fowl and ham, giving off an unbelievable aroma. A single taste is enough to cause the customer to lose themselves in this fog of flavor.

list.name: Delicious Taiyaki
list.desc: A snack shaped like a snapper. Fresh out of the oven, this taiyaki gives off a titillating aroma while it is still a mite scalding to the touch. A single bite causes the sweetness to melt in your mouth instantly. The feeling is akin to watching a fish in a pool bathed in sunset's gleam, its scales attaining a golden sheen.

list.name: Delicious Fullmoon Egg
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Take a bite while it's hot, and have your tastebuds savor the tender minced meat and delicious juice, an experience which is then topped off with a finishing touch of sweet prawn. Before your eyes, you can almost see a full moon over rippling waters, a fishing boat by the shore, and the fishermen's songs echoing down the years.

list.name: Delicious Moon Pie
list.desc: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. As you cut a slice off this small meat pie, the aromas of butter and meat assault your senses simultaneously. The rustic, sweet mouthfeel reminds you of the sights and sounds of harvest festivals, bringing a smile unbidden to your face.

list.name: Delicious Almond Tofu
list.desc: A dessert made from ground almonds. It has the exquisite look and texture of a piece of white jade, and could pass as an art piece — so much so that you could not entertain the idea of actually eating it.

list.name: Delicious Come and Get It
list.desc: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. The mixture of meat and vegetables is spot-on, the presentation is flawless, and the blend of flavors in the broth brings out the best of everything. Don't mind if I do.

list.name: Delicious Matsutake Meat Rolls
list.desc: A pan-fried meat dish. It combines the essences of the mountains and the nourishments of the celestial bodies. It is a very nutritious dish that will surely bring a smile to your face.

list.name: Delicious Squirrel Fish
list.desc: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is expertly handled to exhibit an elegant shape; however, the exquisitely balanced sweet-and-sour taste is really where the dish truly comes alive. The culinary skills involved in preparing this dish can impress even the greatest chefs of Liyue.

list.name: Delicious Berry Mizu Manjuu
list.desc: A crystal-clear snack. The regular, round balls sit upon the plate like coalesced flowing water, and their fillings glisten like pearls. During warm seasons, the very sight of this dish is a balm to the soul, and when it enters your mouth, the mild sweetness that flows out from within causes all your frustrations to vanish without a trace.

list.name: Delicious Crystal Shrimp
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The outer skin is as clear as its crystal namesake, and when it enters the mouth, one's tongue could be forgiven for thinking that the fresh shrimp within is still alive. Those who eat it can only lament that four pieces per serving is far, far too few.

list.name: Delicious Black-Back Perch Stew
list.desc: A poached fish dish. The fish fillets are so tender and juicy that they almost seem to come alive in your mouth. The sense of loss is so unbearable that when you swallow a piece down, you just have to treat yourself to another.

list.name: Delicious Invigorating Kitty Meal
list.desc: This main dish looks rather cute. The simple methodology used to make it has maximized flavor retention in its ingredients. Even cats who usually pay humdrum humanity little mind will surely come running over when they catch a whiff of this. Uh, wait a moment. Was this supposed to attract dogs, too?

list.name: Delicious Stir-Fried Shrimp
list.desc: A mild and luscious dish. The plump shrimp are packed full of flavor just waiting to burst out on the first bite, creating wave after wave of indulgent deliciousness, like drops of water falling one by one onto a still lake, ending just as the sweet aftertaste finally begins to emerge.

list.name: Delicious Fisherman's Toast
list.desc: Onion-covered toast. Exudes a wonderful aroma. Are the fish biting for the bait, or is it the toast they're after?

list.name: Delicious Imported Poultry
list.desc: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. Having been marinated beforehand, the fowl has had several layers of flavor added to it, keeping its oiliness in perfect moderation. Bite down on that crispy, crackling flour-skin, and feel the rich juices of the fowl rush into your mouth and whet your appetite.

list.name: Delicious Satisfying Salad
list.desc: A vegetable salad. Fresh, light, and varied. You'd never get tired of eating this, even if you had to eat it for the rest of your life.

list.name: Delicious Flaming Red Bolognese
list.desc: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The beautiful, authentic flavors take you on a culinary adventure from the first bite to the last.

list.name: Delicious Katsu Sandwich
list.desc: A nutritionally-balanced meal. The fragrant and fluffy bread fills you right up, while the crispy, juicy katsu titillates the senses. One single bite is all it takes to fill you from tongue to gut with satisfaction. Now then, who was the one who first thought of this brilliant combination?

list.name: Delicious Fried Radish Balls
list.desc: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.

list.name: Delicious Grilled Tiger Fish
list.desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The shimmering golden skin has locked the fresh and tender meat in. You cannot help but sigh in satisfaction as you chew on it. Not a scrap of meat here will go uneaten, not even those stuck firmly to the bamboo stick.

list.name: Delicious Steak
list.desc: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.

list.name: Delicious Mushroom Pizza
list.desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. It's a party in your mouth and the cheese and mushrooms invited all their delicious friends.

list.name: Delicious Stir-Fried Filet
list.desc: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat. The spiciness is as a blaze amidst a field of snow that ignites your appetite and leaves you craving more.

list.name: Delicious Jewelry Soup
list.desc: A simple vegetable soup. The mild-tasting soup is filled with the fragrance of fresh vegetables. This down-to-earth and heart-warming soup can rival any luxurious dish.

list.name: Delicious Sweet Madame
list.desc: Honey-roasted fowl. Tender and sweet, the meat has perfectly fused with the honey, ensuring the only thing left of this dish will be the cleanly-picked bones.

list.name: Delicious Sweet Shrimp Sushi
list.desc: A fresh and sweet traditional dish. Crystal-clear shrimp reclines on the snow-white piles of rice. The sourness of the vinegared grains and sweetness of the meat intertwine upon your tongue like the gentle dance of lapping waves on white shores.

list.name: Delicious Cream Stew
list.desc: A meat and vegetable stew. These warm, buttery ingredients are so good that you almost want to dive into the cream stew and cuddle up with them.

list.name: Delicious Goulash
list.desc: A steaming-hot stew. Just one spoonful sends a down-to-earth sense of satisfaction welling up from the depths of your heart. The meat's flavor grows with every chew, bringing limitless strength to the eater even in the coldest wintry wastes.

list.name: Delicious Rice Buns
list.desc: Soft and fluffy buns. The unique sweetness of the whole grains passes between your teeth and lips as you chew. The relatively nondescript ingredients have been transformed into a true delicacy by your labors. This is one of the simple pleasures of the common folk and tastes best after some good, honest work.

list.name: Delicious Rice Pudding
list.desc: A dessert made from rice. The soft, sticky rice and the sweet milk have melded together perfectly, their tastes complementing each other. If you eat it hot, you can enjoy the dense rice grains, and if you leave it till it's cold, you can savor the gentle fragrance of milk — each possessing its own beauty. People who eat such a dish cannot help but wonder: how many experiments led up to this moment?

list.name: Delicious Vegetarian Abalone
list.desc: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. With the aid of the sauce, the matsutake has achieved an excellent, elegant mouth-feel that so rivals scallop in tenderness and abalone in freshness that you can hardly tell them apart. If you left your customer guessing before revealing the truth later, you would be sure to earn their astonished praise.

list.name: Delicious Rainbow Aster
list.desc: A unique drink. Calla Lilies from Mondstadt and Lavender Melons from Inazuma meet from across mountains and seas before having their flavors blended together to perfection using smooth milk. Novel satisfaction guaranteed — indeed, it is utterly unsurprising that the ill Shogun in the tale was re-energized by the merits of this drink alone.

list.name: Delicious Braised Meat
list.desc: A stewed dish. The rich soup sauce and fragrant meat combine to give off an irresistible aroma, while the scattered vegetables are crisp instead of soft, enriching the flavor of the dish... so much so that people will tuck in despite the intense heat until there is nothing left but the sauce... Wait, why don't we just dip our bread in that?

list.name: Delicious Konda Cuisine
list.desc: Slowly stewed local cuisine. Well-honed temperature control has allowed every ingredient to be cooked just right. This is it — the exact same aroma that you smell, simple yet surpassing many delicacies, when you take a stroll through Konda Village at night. Surely a village local roaming abroad would begin to miss home if they were to eat this dish so made by you.

list.name: Delicious Jueyun Guoba
list.desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Chow down on that lovely, fragrant crust and the steaming ham sitting atop it. The spices and spiciness race neck and neck into your nostrils, creating an addictive flavor that has you licking that last finger rather than let a single scrap go to waste.

list.name: Delicious Sakura Tempura
list.desc: A dish deep-fried in oil. The batter is thin and sheer, like a set of luxurious clothes over the ingredients. The outside crispness and freshness within form amazing layers of texture, leading those who eat it to marvel at just how this delicacy was created.

list.name: Delicious Sakura Shrimp Crackers
list.desc: Crispy, crunchy crackers. The lovely hue of the Sakura Bloom is perfectly preserved, as is the elegant flowing shape of the Shrimp. Before you even put it in your mouth, you can already taste the fresh fragrance rushing up your nose. The crispy, refreshing flavor spreads throughout your mouth as you chew, with every bite showing off more of the mingled wonders of sakura and sea.

list.name: Delicious Sakura Mochi
list.desc: A delicate and elegant snack. It is surrounded by the fragrance of sakura, and its elegant exterior hides a loveliness that comes forth and disappears in a single instant. In a moment when all is silent, a single taste returns you to the moment when the sakura were as a blizzard all about you.

list.name: Delicious Jade Parcels
list.desc: An exquisite-looking dish. The sweetness of the ham and the crisp lotus seeds are a match made in heaven. The aromatic broth pours down like the dawning light, caressing your tongue with an unworldly delicious taste.

list.name: Delicious Bamboo Shoot Soup
list.desc: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. One whiff is enough to whet one's appetite greatly, and the concentrated flavors fill your body with every spoonful of soup. It is almost like spreading a pair of wings and walking on clouds.

list.name: Delicious Wakatakeni
list.desc: A light-colored vegetarian dish. The new life born in the embrace of the ocean and the crisp freshness that sprouted in the mountains have blended into this broth. The light and gentle flavors give one a foretaste of the wonder of the four seasons, and of the revivification of all life.

list.name: Delicious Soba Noodles
list.desc: A plain and simple noodle dish. The unique flavor of buckwheat has been maximized, and as the springy noodles slip past your throat, they leave behind a gentle aftertaste, like an old song floating through a tranquil courtyard.

list.name: Delicious Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
list.desc: A steamed egg dish. The succulent eggs melt right in your mouth, and before you know it, a smooth and subtle sweetness of newly sprung lotus flowers covers your tastebuds.

list.name: Delicious Lotus Flower Crisp
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The flower petals waver to life if you gently blow on them. As you close your eyes and take a bite, a luscious flavor covers your tastebuds like a sweet harmony of blooming flowers and fluttering birds in the breeze.

list.name: Delicious Radish Veggie Soup
list.desc: Radish-based vegetable soup. The clear aromas are perfectly accompanied by a sunny summer afternoon.

list.name: Delicious Mondstadt Hash Brown
list.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.

list.name: Delicious Mondstadt Grilled Fish
list.desc: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, locking the delicious juice inside the meat under the crispy skin. A small bite is all that's needed to unlock its wondrous and delicious taste.

list.name: Delicious Grilled Unagi Fillet
list.desc: A grilled dish. The fat oils sizzle all across the meat's surface like a flowery prelude. The baptism of charcoal fire and moistening sauce has imparted a delicate softness to the unagi's mouthfeel. If you paired this was rice, you'd be liable to leave not even a single drop of sauce behind.

list.name: Delicious Mint Jelly
list.desc: A refreshing dessert. The perfect springiness makes for a lovely sight indeed when you strike it with the back of a small spoon. Taste that spoonful and that cool and refreshing feel will spread through your mouth instantly, dispelling any negative emotions you may harbor to the point where you feel like you've become a new person.

list.name: Delicious Omelette Rice
list.desc: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. Gently poking at the outer layer of the egg skin, which is not wholly cooked yet wraps itself and its red ketchup crown around the tightly packed white rice, shall prick the appetite of any customer — and after they have partaken joyfully, they cannot help but smile.

list.name: Delicious Sticky Honey Roast
list.desc: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.

list.name: Delicious Crab Roe Kourayaki
list.desc: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The crab meat still has a lovely scarlet shade, and its meat is tender and juicy. The crab roe has a refreshing aroma, and is rich and mellow to the taste. The sheer grace of this entity upon your tongue makes you start to wonder how the crab shell might taste.

list.name: Delicious Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
list.desc: A luxurious bake. The scent is so rich and heavenly. You'll only be done once you've licked the plate clean.

list.name: Delicious Crab Roe Tofu
list.desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. The tofu is so tender that it might break if you blew on a spoonful of it. Each granule of the crab roe is plump and filled with crab oil that oozes out onto your lips the moment you have a single bite. Chewing is not needed at all. The food travels down your gullet in a flash, leaving nothing but the memory of its fresh flavor.

list.name: Delicious Qingce Stir Fry
list.desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. Just catching a whiff is enough to work up one's appetite. The tingle of chili titillates the tongue, leaving you ready to devour ten bowls in a single sitting.

list.name: Delicious Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
list.desc: A traditional snack from Liyue. The intense charred aroma of the wok sits on the condiments, which are shoveled into the fluffy buns, filling the air with a fragrance that itself worth rave reviews. Just as the laboring hands of Liyue's people created this famous, prosperous harbor, these ordinary ingredients can be "developed" by one's labor into something surprising in its deliciousness. No wonder such a dish could even awaken a sleeping god...

list.name: Delicious Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
list.desc: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.

list.name: Delicious Golden Shrimp Balls
list.desc: A deep-fried shrimp dish. From the rich, indulgent scent of crispy golden potato strips, to the satisfying crunch as you take your first bite, to the grand finale of delicious sweet shrimp, this dish is pure pleasure.

list.name: Delicious Tuna Sushi
list.desc: A traditional dish made with one's bare hands. The delicate fat lines the fish slices like hoarfrost falling on a road, and the balance of fat and lean is perfect. The make of this dish is not fancy in the slightest, but has imparted both the profundity of field and sea to the tasting tongue.

list.name: Delicious Barbatos Ratatouille
list.desc: A simple chowder with a long history. After much careful stewing, the flavors of three different vegetables have been blended to perfection. Like this, it is not hard to imagine why someone once called it "the best chowder I've ever tasted."

list.name: Delicious Onigiri
list.desc: A portable dish made with rice. The crispy seaweed adds a bit of umami to the down-to-earth sweetness of the glutinous rice. For the final touch, the fresh fish within the Onigiri strikes like an ambushing band, and the satisfaction it brings to body and mind is like the clarion flourish of victory.

list.name: Delicious Jueyun Chili Chicken
list.desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The chicken is extremely tender, juicy, and sweet. The delicious taste transports you to the realm of dreams.

list.name: Delicious Crispy Potato Shrimp Platter
list.desc: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. The moment this enters your mouth, the springiness of the shrimp and the crispiness of the potato slices form a profound contrast. The fluffy potatoes immediately follow up by melding these flavors together, creating a sweet experience that makes you relax, body and soul.

list.name: Delicious Radish and Fish Stew
list.desc: A meat and vegetable dish. Migratory fish have experienced many trials of the bitter cold, towering waves, and tumultuous storms en route to arriving upon the stove, and together with the radish, they have absorbed the essence of the flavorful soup long before they were ladled onto your plate. This sweetness warms the heart and soul, like a fire in the midst of a blistering world of snow.

list.name: Delicious Unagi Chazuke
list.desc: A light and tasty main dish. The tea and soup weave an elegant, fragrant melody punctuated by the pure white grains, while the unagi, baptized in coal-fire, provides tender, gentle decoration to the mix. The various aromas of eel and tea and the light sweetness of rice mix well on your tongue into something truly sublime. A triple threat not to be trifled with, indeed.

list.name: Delicious Bird Egg Sushi
list.desc: An everyday Inazuman dish. The tender egg bounces on the tongue together with the rich grains, bringing to mind a joy that recalls one's childhood. Eager to relive that sweetness, you pick up another before your brain can even catch up.

list.name: Delicious Egg Roll
list.desc: A fried egg dish. The shape of the dish as a whole, the golden color, the fluffy mouthfeel... a small piece of this may not fill your stomach, but it will fill you with warmth. Not to mention that sweetness that you can almost reach out and touch — simply irresistible.

list.name: Delicious Chicken Tofu Pudding
list.desc: A dish that requires great precision to make. Successfully formed into a single block with no debris, it truly looks like tofu pudding. Its exquisite tenderness unravels on the tongue the moment it is scooped up with a porcelain spoon and fed into the mouth, and the taste is so sublime that it almost feels like having an out-of-body experience. What lies before you is no mere dish, but a gentle breeze, a pure spring, a stroke of the divine.

list.name: Delicious Sautéed Matsutake
list.desc: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. So smooth and fragrant, eating them is like having the bursting vitality of spring absorbed into your stomach.

list.name: Delicious Sunshine Sprat
list.desc: Gently fried fish dish. The fish melts in your mouth, melding the flavors of land and sea together as it does, making for an unforgettable experience. Little wonder, then, that such a simply-made dish can make it into restaurants of great class.

list.name: Delicious Butter Crab
list.desc: A grilled crab dish. The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the tastes buds so seductively that before you know it, you've eaten it all, and are left sipping at the dregs of butter in the crab's shell, hoping to recapture a fragment of the dish's beauty.

list.name: Delicious Golden Crab
list.desc: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The aroma of the crab meat inundates the room the instant it leaves the frying pan, and a single bite fills one's palate with the countless rustic flavors of a fishing village hometown. It seems that such simple yet timeless village customs held the secret to this lavish, golden sumptuousness all along.

list.name: Delicious Dragon Beard Noodles
list.desc: Noodles that are as slender as the hairs on a dragon's beard. The slim noodles are as a waterfall, draping their way into a soup that has captured the very essence of the mountains themselves. The softer mouthfeel compared to the average noodle dish makes it nigh impossible to stop eating once you've started.

list.name: Cui'er's Letter to Chaoxi
list.desc: A letter from Cui'er to her lover, Chaoxi. It's a rather long letter — presumably packed with page upon page of poignant prose about how much she longs to see him again.

list.name: Smaragdus Nephrite Fragment
list.desc: A stone that Yanfei and Zhiqiao have adjudged to be Smaragdus Nephrite.

list.name: Smaragdus Jadeite
list.desc: A stone known as Smaragdus Jadeite. What will Madame Ping use it for?

list.name: Jade Parcels
list.desc: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.

list.name: Old Key
list.desc: According to Konda Densuke, this is the key to the well's lid.

list.name: Archaic Stone
list.desc:
A rare ore mined from a deserted spot deep in the mountains.
This sort of ore can only be found in veins in the oldest mountains. Perhaps it is due to its extreme rarity, but many merchants haven't even so much as heard of this rock.
The ore itself has incredible clarity and its colors are dazzling, almost seeming to glow with an inner light that brings out its blue-violet beauty, which is like the distant and lovely sunset sky.
The few scholars who understand its value gave it a most straightforward name — "Archaic Stone."
If you intend to give it as a gift, it would be best to give it to one who recognizes what they're receiving.

list.name: Frostshield Potion
list.desc:
A miraculous potion that boosts Cryo RES and makes one able to withstand extreme cold.
Induces a chilling sensation when drank, but once this sensation spreads throughout the body, the feeling of being cold disappears.

list.name: Heatshield Potion
list.desc:
A miraculous potion that boosts Pyro RES and makes one able to withstand high heat.
It works not by cooling the body, but by helping the body acclimate to high temperatures.

list.name: Congzi's Plaustrite Shards
list.desc: Plaustrite Shards of fine quality. A Xiao Lantern made from such material is sure to carry happy hopes high into the sky.

list.name: Hearty Mushrooms
list.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

list.name: Page of Scribbled Writing
list.desc: A page with very messy handwriting. The words have been struck out with crude brushstrokes, and it has also been soaked in water to the point where nothing can be made out.

list.name: Pepper
list.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

list.name: Carrot
list.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

list.name: Fragile Wooden Plank
list.desc: A fragile wooden plank that is easily breakable. It doesn't serve much of a purpose aside from pretending that you're strong.

list.name: Fragile Bone Shard
list.desc:
A bone shard once carried by a Geovishap.
Although they are quite fragile, they seem to still harbor some indescribable power.

list.name: Bamboo Shoot Soup
list.desc: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The meat and ham have been diced into small pieces, and the soup has been kept on low heat till it turned milky white. The process has brought out the distinct flavors of both kinds of meat, making for an especially tasty soup.

list.name: Festering Dragon Marrow
list.desc:
Specialized refinement material for Festering Desire.
This is the product of purifying Durin's vile venom, which has seeped into and spread throughout Dragonspine's ley lines. By using it on a bloodthirsty sword with a strong affinity for such materials, you can increase that sword's power.

list.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

list.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

list.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

list.name: Vayuda Turquoise Sliver
list.desc: Character Ascension Material.

list.name: Der Weisheit Letzter Schluss (Life)
list.desc: Mona's specialty. A great work from a great astrologer. Its greatest aspect lies with its cost-effectiveness in filling one's stomach.

list.name: Flora's Bookmark
list.desc: A bookmark given to you by Flora. Made from a dried-out Windwheel Aster, even in its box you barely notice the weight of it.

list.name: Umbrella Shop: Kaleidoscope of Parasol Colors
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Umbrella Shop: Kaleidoscope of Parasol Colors.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Bird and Blossom Design Fountain
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Bird and Blossom Design Fountain.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Reins of Revival
list.desc: The hereditary national treasure of Byakuyakoku. Apart from representing the highest authority in the land, it also confers the ability to control souls and this realm.

list.name: Wakatakeni
list.desc: A light-colored vegetarian dish. Broth is first poured into the pot before the bamboo shoots, and then the seaweed, are added in. The result is an elegant product with a light mouthfeel that agrees well with all palates. Suitable as a pre-meal appetizer or as a side to a main dish.

list.name: Apple
list.desc: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

list.name: Apple Cider
list.desc: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. Said to have a strong sobering effect, tavern patrons often order this as the last drink of the night.

list.name: Legend of the Lone Sword (I)
list.desc: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of the origins of Jin the Seventy-Second's revenge.

list.name: Legend of the Lone Sword (III)
list.desc: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's duel with the chief of Tupi Village.

list.name: Legend of the Lone Sword (II)
list.desc: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's arrival in Tupi Village.

list.name: Legend of the Lone Sword (IV)
list.desc: A popular martial arts novel in Liyue Harbor. In a world without elemental energy or alchemy, a tale unfolds of love and hate between friends and foes. This volume tells of Jin the Seventy-Second's treacherous trek into the mountains.

list.name: Soba Noodles
list.desc: A plain and simple noodle dish. The buckwheat noodles are boiled and then cooled. Their texture is smooth and they have just the right amount of toughness. The inexpensive ingredients and simple make of this dish have made it very popular amongst Inazumans.

list.name: Luminescent Pollen
list.desc: A small parcel of luminescent Fungal Spore powder, a common medical ingredient in the land of rainforests. Merchants usually sell them in paper packets.

list.name: Glowgrass Bait
list.desc:
A special bait made from Magical Crystal Ore and Seagrass, it shines where no light illuminates, and may thus hold special attraction for those fellows who ever yearn for light.
If you should run out of these, you can get more from Kujirai Momiji.

Suitable for catching all fish species.

list.name: Pharmacist's Notebook (I)
list.desc: Notes left by Yasumoto. They still smell strongly of Naku Weed.

list.name: Pharmacist's Notebook (III)
list.desc: Notes left by Yasumoto. It shows some signs of blotching and water damage.

list.name: Pharmacist's Notebook (II)
list.desc: Notes left by Yasumoto. It has been conscientiously protected from rain damage.

list.name: Tea Break Pancake Cooked by Lily
list.desc: The inner layers have not quite been pressed together to perfection, and it does taste a little burnt, but these are the best pancakes that Lily can make.

list.name: Sara's Special Dish
list.desc: A special dish that Sara had specially made for Jilliana. What dish could it be? And what could be so special about it?

list.name: Sara's Letter
list.desc: A thick-set letter sent back from Liyue Harbor to Sara. Several feathers are still stuck in the envelope, signifying the effort that carrier pigeon put in and the sort of treatment it received.

list.name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
list.desc: A steamed egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.

list.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.

list.name: Lotus Head
list.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

list.name: Flowers for Princess Fischl (0)
list.desc:
The preliminary volume of the "Flowers for Princess Fischl" series.
This work originally came in a violet and black wooden box as a limited edition gift, but many hardcore fans of the series who wanted to collect the whole saga were enraged by the great amount of content versus the small number of copies printed.
Due to this, Yae Publishing House would name this book "Volume 0" and sell it separately. Eventually, the original work, the boxed collector's edition, and Volume 0 would all come to be regarded as standard by fans.

list.name: Cuihua Wood
list.desc:
Timber obtained from Cuihua Trees. With its lovely color and unique make, it will surely be able to take on myriad uses upon undergoing suitable workmanship.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Madame Ping's Box
list.desc: A seemingly ordinary container that had been trapped in amber. Its weight, once held, is astounding, and no matter what you do, you can't seem to open it...

list.name: Radish Veggie Soup
list.desc: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.

list.name: Valberry
list.desc: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.

list.name: Glory's Dandelion Seeds
list.desc: Dandelion Seeds that contain Glory's thoughts. The wind can probably carry these far, far away.

list.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
list.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.

list.name: Mondstadt Shrine of Depths Key
list.desc:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Mondstadt.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

list.name: Mondstadt Grilled Fish
list.desc: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.

list.name: Mondstadt General Goods Order Board
list.desc: Mondstadt General Goods Order Board

list.name: The Mondstadt Tower (I)
list.desc:
In the age of depression and tyranny, the outlander girl met the ominous orphan. Does this fateful encounter foretell a tragic ending?
The historic romance novel, The Mondstadt Tower, begins!

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (I)
list.desc:
"Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
An unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, an 11-part story, begins here.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VII)
list.desc:
"Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
Can the Hunter also learn magic to make his wish come true? The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 7.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (III)
list.desc:
The Hunter of fruitless hunts was awoken by a commotion outside. Who is at his door?
The story of the Hunter and the Fox continues. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 3.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (IX)
list.desc:
When I have taught all that there is to teach, will it be possible to see this sea of dandelions again...?
In the dandelion sea, the hunter starts to contemplate leaving.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (II)
list.desc:
"Be good and stay put." Trapped by a Mist Flower, what does fate have in store by the fox who met a hunter?
The story of the Hunter and the Fox continues in Part 2.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (V)
list.desc:
Upon accepting the Fox's conditions, he came to the place where all the prey who disappeared had eventually gone to — an endless field of dandelions.
The story of the Hunter and the Fox in the sea of dandelions. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 5.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VIII)
list.desc:
"When he has mastered human language..." The fox's voice is gently carried away by the midnight breeze, drifting further and further away together with the dandelion seeds...
After all, the fox is a different kind of creature from the human, and the two do not share all the same sense of mirth and misery...

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VI)
list.desc:
"Why do you want to learn the language of human?" "So I can befriend humans when I become one."
The child-like voice says, in the sea of dandelions. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 6.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (X)
list.desc:
The somber parting has finally arrived... The Fox bids farewell to its mother, teacher, and the dandelion sea.
It's time to live up to the promise. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 10.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (XI)
list.desc:
"Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
An unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, the final installment.

list.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (IV)
list.desc:
After a few days apart, a long-awaited reunion takes place on a midsummer's night amidst a veritable blizzard of dandelion seeds.
At the direction of the fox, an ocean of dandelions opens up before the hunter's very eyes...

list.name: Dandelion Seed
list.desc: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

list.name: Grilled Unagi Fillet
list.desc: A grilled dish. The sliced unagi has been steamed first to remove the excess fat before being grilled and sauced. There is no consensus in Inazuma as to where the name "unagi" came from, but everyone at least agrees that it will take a whole lifetime to master its making.

list.name: Blue Dye
list.desc: Blue dye. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

list.name: Fungal Spores
list.desc: A small amount of glittering spore powder left behind by Floating Fungi. Seems that a sneeze is all it takes for this powder to vanish without a trace.

list.name: Mint
list.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

list.name: Mint Jelly
list.desc: A refreshing dessert. The steps to making this are quite simple indeed, and when it slides down your throat, the faint, fresh flavor of mint will leave you feeling reinvigorated for the rest of the day.

list.name: Mint Essential Oil
list.desc: Essential oil extracted from the Mint plant. Used for making perfume.

list.name: Vile's Gift
list.desc: A gift acquired from Vile. Given how heavy it is to hold, there must be quite a lot of items inside.

list.name: Treasure Map
list.desc: A map that records the location of treasure.

list.name: Treasure Map Fragment
list.desc:
A fragment of a larger map that seems to indicate the location of treasure.
If you can find the other fragment, that should complete the picture.

list.name: Silver Raven Insignia
list.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

list.name: Fujiwara Toshiko's Treasure Map
list.desc: A treasure map you obtained from Fujiwara Toshiko. According to her, this map hides the means by which certain mechanisms may be activated.

list.name: Mushroom
list.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

list.name: Shrimp Meat
list.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

list.name: Offerings of the Serpent's Heart
list.desc: Offerings from the Serpent's Heart that contain a fraction of Aberaku's remnant thoughts.

list.name: Reins of Revival Fragment (Serpent's Heart)
list.desc: A fragment of the Reins of Revival. The three fragments, too, follow "The Rule of Three."

list.name: Serpent's Head: Rock Pillar Warding Stone
list.desc: A gem that has an electric scent and that is quite shocking to the touch. It has some unknown connection to the rock pillars on the island.

list.name: Serpent's Head: Rock Pillar Pearl
list.desc: A precious pearl that emits Electro energy and a strangely-colored light. It seems to have some connection with the rock pillars on the island.

list.name: Jakotsu Mine: Rock Pillar Warding Stone
list.desc: A gem that has an electric scent and that is quite shocking to the touch. It has some unknown connection to the rock pillars on the island.

list.name: Jakotsu Mine: Rock Pillar Pearl
list.desc: A precious pearl that emits Electro energy and a strangely-colored light. It seems to have some connection with the rock pillars on the island.

list.name: Omelette Rice
list.desc: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The evenly beaten egg fluids are fried into half-doneness before being poured out on top of the rice, and tomato ketchup is drizzled over top afterward once it is ready to plate up. They say that this dish was derived from another region, though this version involves a more complicated cooking method.

list.name: Sticky Honey Roast
list.desc: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.

list.name: Lizard Tail
list.desc: A lizard tail that curled up after losing its owner. Very bitter, but has skin hardening properties.

list.name: Butterfly Wings
list.desc: Brightly colored wings. The powder that falls from them shimmers a little. Perhaps this is what allows them to fly?

list.name: Crab
list.desc: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

list.name: Crab Bait
list.desc: Crab bait that you got from Xudong. Laying it should attract crabs.

list.name: Crab Roe
list.desc: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

list.name: Crab Roe Kourayaki
list.desc: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The meat and roe are mixed evenly, before being garnished with plump crab legs. The happiness that flows forth from that first bite imparts meaning upon your prior forbearance.

list.name: Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake
list.desc: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!

list.name: Crab Roe Tofu
list.desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Crab roe is stir-fried till the oil within oozes out before being added to boiled tofu and accented with broth. Simple, yes, but gloriously fresh.

list.name: False Worm Bait
list.desc:
This imitation worm bait is made mostly out of condensate, and will twist its body according to the underwater currents, resulting in its fatal attraction to overly-curious fish. Professionals will even add some fruit to it to increase its fragrance and make it utterly irresistable.

Suitable for catching Shirakodai and Angelfish.

list.name: Dendrobium
list.desc: A vibrant plant that has also been named the "lycoris" by the poets. It was once thought extinct in the Inazuman archipelago, only to re-emerge now upon the battlefields. It is said that it blooms most enchantingly where much blood was spilled.

list.name: Bloodbranch Coral
list.desc: A coral in which the life force of Watatsumi Omikami dwells. It is a vital part of the Watatsumi Goryou Matsuri.

list.name: Bloodjade Branch
list.desc:
Nurtured by the might of the dragon king, these bone branches glitter with strange, unique colors.
Hatred coursed through the natural streams and kissed the cold moonlight, and from them were these crystalline branches born and grown...
Even though they were severed in battle, these branches steeped in dragon blood rustle as if eternally ill-at-ease.

list.name: An Onikabuto Affected by Tatarigami
list.desc: An onikabuto that has fallen under the influence of Tatarigami. Who knows what sort of tests Xavier wants to put it through...

list.name: A Note Someone Stuffed You
list.desc: As you were walking down the streets of Inazuma, someone stuffed this note onto your person. Two strange symbols are drawn on it.

list.name: Water-Logged Box
list.desc: A water-logged box. It is packed very tightly — its contents seem to be of much importance...

list.name: Cooked Meat
list.desc: Meat that has just been cooked. Maybe it can be used in a dish...

list.name: Stolen Relic
list.desc: Cultural relics dug up by the Treasure Hoarders, and packed willy-nilly into a box. When you lift the box, it feels like it could collapse at any moment.

list.name: Hidden Ledger
list.desc: A ledger that seems to contain the recent taxation situations of Ritou's merchants. Its owner is Keijirou.

list.name: Wind-Caressed Aster
list.desc: A Windwheel Aster that's been through the gentle caress of an Anemo Slime. Although its appearance hasn't changed, faint puffs of air seem to escape between your fingers as you hold it in your hand.

list.name: A Box of Gadgets
list.desc: A box that contains the gadgets Soraya gave to you. You can feel its weight in your hand. It should be able to satisfy the greed of certain people.

list.name: Drifting Bottle With Letter
list.desc: A floating bottle that you fished up accidentally. The cork on this bottle has already been damaged, and the letter within has been mildewed. Thankfully, you discovered it in time, or its contents may have become lost to time altogether.

list.name: Mountainator Cannonball (Fuse Attached)
list.desc: A cannonball with a fuse carefully attached. Ready to be fired at any time!

list.name: Box of Leaves
list.desc: A box with some leaves inside. Something feels unusual about it when you hold it in your hand, and you can't help but feel a little uneasy... can this box really contain these leaves?

list.name: Package of Fresh Flowers
list.desc: The package contains some flowers trimmed by Flora herself. One can almost smell their fragrance through the packaging.

list.name: Fossil Bag
list.desc: A bag containing the suspected fossil of the Lunar Leviathan. Give it to Kujirai Momiji... though one wonders if she can accept this reality.

list.name: Box of Goods Invoices
list.desc: A box containing invoices of goods. Common sense says that to avoid raising any suspicion, it's usually best to not open to open the box and take a peek.

list.name: Meal Fee Pouch
list.desc: A small coin pouch of Mora that contains payment for a meal ordered at the Good Hunter. Do not take your cut out of this bag.

list.name: Box of Clothes
list.desc: This box contains the clothes that Ningguang asked you to go get. As she said, "I need a change of mood, and a change of clothes will facilitate that."

list.name: Bag of Clothes
list.desc: A bag that contains Lyudochka's Fatui uniform. Considering the controversial nature of Fatui uniforms, it is best not to let other people see this.

list.name: Key Fence: Self-Restraint
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Key Fence: Self-Restraint.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Key Gateway: Beneath the Clouds
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Key Gateway: Beneath the Clouds.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Meal Box by Smiley Yanxiao for Jiangxue
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Meal Box by Smiley Yanxiao for Jiangxue_icon.png
list.desc: A tightly sealed meal box. It's quite heavy, it must contain quite a big portion.

list.name: Scribe's Box
list.desc:
A treasure box with a decorative pattern at the bottom. The ornamentation seems to be a part of a three-piece motif. Once the pattern is completed, a certain door may open.
"I yearn for those frosty skies to stand in flames and burn till there's no living soul in the world."
"I yearn for us to turn to dust carried by the wind so that we can find that outsider who abandoned the princess."
"I yearn for the black dragon from the princess' dreams to engulf the land in a cloud of scarlet poison."
"For I am the last one. There's no need to keep watch any longer."
"I've heard of people who are building a new nation without gods. Perhaps they'll have the power to stand against this world."

list.name: The Honest Cat's Little Lie
list.desc: A suspense novel. The packaging suggests that many readers were attracted by the unexpected twists and turns of the plot.

list.name: Strange Fortune Slip
list.desc: A special slip that can only be obtained if you use a certain secret code while exchanging for a Fortune Slip. Indicates a target and the location where they will emerge.

list.name: Instructions: Portable Waypoint
list.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Portable Waypoint. With a Portable Waypoint, you can create a teleport waypoint wherever in the world you want.

list.name: Instructions: Geoculus Resonance Stone
list.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Geoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Geoculi.

list.name: Instructions: Condensed Resin
list.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making Condensed Resin. Using resin in this condensed form to activate certain Ley Line Blossoms and Petrified Trees will increase your efficiency. You can hold no more than 5 Condensed Resin at a time.

list.name: Instructions: Anemoculus Resonance Stone
list.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Anemoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Anemoculi.

list.name: Norma's Order
list.desc: Norma's food order. You can feel its warmth in your hand.

list.name: Someone's Diary I: Yaoguang Shoal
list.desc: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Yaoguang Shoal.

list.name: Someone's Diary III: Jueyun Karst
list.desc: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's adventures at Jueyun Karst.

list.name: Someone's Diary II: Guili Plains
list.desc: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Guili Plains.

list.name: Someone's Diary V: Jinren Island
list.desc: A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Jinren Island.

list.name: Someone's Diary IV: Liyue Harbor
list.desc: A diary left behind by someone in Liyue that tells of the owner's adventures there.

list.name: Mysterious Flyer
list.desc: A pamphlet you obtained from the Ms. Hina Fan Club. You've got to say that the design looks kind of familiar...

list.name: Tofu
list.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

list.name: Goods Invoice
list.desc: An invoice with information of goods recorded on it. With only a few simple goods listed on it, someone must have selected these items.

list.name: Ako's Sake Vessel
list.desc:
Specialized refinement material for "The Catch."
This was the favored liquor vessel of Ako Domeki, who once ruled over the Seirai region. The sea has brought it onto an angler's hook.

list.name: Redrot Bait
list.desc:
Fish bait made from mixing Dendrobium and mashed meat. The unique rank sweetness of this bait spreads very quickly in the water, attracting fierce aquatic predators. Use with caution, however! Put too much of this bait down and you might hook in nastier customers than you bargained for!

Suitable for catching Sticklebacks, Bettas, Venomspine Fish, Akai Maou, and Snowstriders.

list.name: Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power_icon.png
list.desc: A popular light novel in Inazuma which tells the story of a mere mortal suddenly turning into the Raiden Shogun. The story is well-received for its novel plot and has inspired many light novelists.

list.name: Qingce Stir Fry
list.desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.

list.name: Spicy Stew
list.desc: Barbara's specialty. Carrots cut into cute little stars make this dish... Wait, AHH, where did this spiciness come from!?

list.name: Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
list.desc: A traditional snack from Liyue. The fresh dough is turned out into a round, rested, and then placed inside a cage to steam. The meat and vegetables are then washed and diced, before being fried quickly in an oiled wok. When eaten, the fried condiments must be placed into the empty space in the middle of the buns before they are eaten together. Between the crisp vegetables and the flavorful meat, this is solid, great flavor.

list.name: Somewhat Clear Image
list.desc: An image showing the lowest level of the Mikage Furnace. Who knows what Xavier can glean from it...

list.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
This coral cannot be found anywhere in Teyvat, but was a gift that the great serpent obtained when it broke into the Dark Sea. For that abyssal snake, to be filled with coral was to be mighty, and its power would be shaved away as those corals were lost. In other words, those corals contain power far beyond the norm.

list.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Fleeing into the Dark Sea, the god that had lost everything met the abandoned people who had nothing within the ocean depths. Thus it elected to remain and become their "Orobashi no Mikoto," their "Watatsumi Omikami."
It is said that the great snake god once broke off all the coral branches on its body to give light to the children who were curled up in the darkness. They also say that it used these coral branches to create a huge ladder to allow those children to once again reach the surface and see the light of day.

list.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Watatsumi Island is the furthest from Narukami Island in the Inazuman island chain, and its name means "the god of the oceans" in the island's ancient tongue. Legend has it that when the great serpent first arose within the abyssal nation of ever-night, its fluorescent body was covered in myriad-colored coral.

list.name: Golden Branch of a Distant Sea
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The meaning that lies behind the name "Watatsumi" is simply the unrequited hopes that the abandoned people who dwelt in the deep sea pinned upon the serpent god that led them.
And it was also because the serpent god now had people who worshiped it that it stayed in the world it should have long fled, breaking off the coral branches that adorned its body, treading upon land where it should not have, and facing a foe it could never hope to match — till at last, its divine form was sundered along with the mountains, its ichor turned into plasma, and its will and power became a curse that could never be extinguished: Tatarigami.

list.name: Flower of Farsight
list.desc:
One of the six lost offerings scattered throughout The Chasm... possibly? It seems just like an ordinary Qingxin, and one that has newly sprouted as well, seeing as how its white petals have never been touched by dew.
Who knows how many people have once climbed up to high heights to pick one such fresh flower? Who knows if these flowers eventually bore witness to partings or reunions?

list.name: String of Pearls (I)
list.desc: Zixin is a poor fisherwoman whose family struggles to make ends meet. One day, she is selling fish on the street when she carelessly loses the string of pearls she usually wears. Though what she does not know is that this lost string of pearls will change her fate for good...

list.name: String of Pearls (III)
list.desc: Our heroine meets the young man again. They fall in love and are ready to live together happily ever after. But a despot who covets Zixin's beauty and virtue is putting the skids under their plans...

list.name: String of Pearls (II)
list.desc: The young man who had returned Zixin's string of pearls left without revealing his name. Grandma Zhang comes up with a plan that will allow Zixin to find him...

list.name: String of Pearls (V)
list.desc: The bandit lair in the dead of night is pitch-dark. The tyrant, the youth, and the lady grope in the dark in search of one another, and there, a perilous misunderstanding is about to play out...

list.name: String of Pearls (IV)
list.desc: To rescue the one he loves, the young man charges heedlessly into danger, entering the lair of the enemy with his sword drawn: and on the other side, his beloved hangs on desperately...

list.name: Heartstring Noodles
list.desc: Shenhe's specialty. Perhaps this comes from her desire to recreate a flavor that lives only in her memories, but Shenhe has poured much time and effort into both making and plating this dish. The smooth noodles and delectable soup make a great impression indeed, but the most indelible aspects are the dedication and heart put into this dish...

list.name: Mini Seelie: Viola
list.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature purple Seelie. Its color is very similar to that of Electro-infused items. Who knows if you might get a little tingle from poking it...

list.name: Mini Seelie: Rosé
list.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature powder-pink Seelie. Though it cannot say a word, it will silently follow a traveler that strikes its fancy around the world.

list.name: Mini Seelie: Curcuma
list.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature golden Seelie. It gives off a feeling very similar to that of Mora. They say that Seelie of this color represent good fortune.

list.name: Mini Seelie: Dayflower
list.desc:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature sea-blue Seelie. Unlike other Seelie, it does not serve to guide others, but to follow them to see the world.

list.name: Stone of Remembrance
list.desc:
An unusual gemstone capable of removing a seal somewhere.
You can feel the turbulent thoughts racing relentless within when you hold it in your hand. Somewhere in this world are buried the memories of an ancient war.
"For a future without the pain of savage slaughter, for a future without lives lived in vain, for a future where every day is filled with peace..."

list.name: Moonchase Charm
list.desc: These jade talismans have been placed in various areas by the Adventurers' Guild. They are made from crystal-clear and gently lustrous Plaustrite Shards. It is said that these talismans contain the essence of the bright white moon and store the reminiscences that people have of festivals past.

list.name: Key to Some Place
list.desc:
A key found in Tatarasuna.
Where there's a key, there's got to be a lock to match.

list.name: General Purpose Directional Conduction Component
list.desc: A basic, common component often found in various creations of an ancient civilization, the function of which seems to be ensuring that these creations continue operating. Due to their close similarity in makeup to the components used in Pursina's Spikes, they can be used to replace its damaged parts. To think that Pursina's Spikes need such priceless objects to repair them... What a terrifyingly high-maintenance device.

list.name: Travel Permit
list.desc: A special Travel Permit that allows travel throughout Inazuma. With this in hand, you can now freely enter and leave Ritou...

list.name: Pass Permit
list.desc:
A pass permit you obtained from Yae Miko. With this, you can enter Tenshukaku without restrictions and meet the Raiden Shogun.
You heard that this was made for emergencies, but that Yae Miko seems to have never had a chance to use it.

list.name: Autake Slate
list.desc:
An example of the Ishine Script that was once used on Tsurumi Island.
It probably needs to be returned to some place in the Autake Plains.

list.name: Missing Component(s)
list.desc: A component that fell from the Purification Device.

list.name: Lost Adventure Notebook
list.desc: A set of adventurer's notes that you picked up in the ruins. It seems to contain a clue to unlocking these mechanisms.

list.name: Ruin Machine Core
list.desc: The core section of a Ruin Guard. Old and new versions of this device are incompatible, and it thus cannot be used to empower other objects. However, the leftover energy should be enough to power one Ruin Guard.

list.name: A Drunkard's Tale (I)
list.desc: One of many popular tales told of Mondstadt's drinkers. This one is the story of a drunkard who stumbled into wolven territory and the lone, starving wolf he encountered there.

list.name: A Drunkard's Tale (III)
list.desc: One of the popular, many tales told by the drinkers of Mondstadt. This drunkard is the one who told the lone wolf of an ancient story.

list.name: A Drunkard's Tale (II)
list.desc: One of many Mondstadt tales told of popular drinkers. This story is the one of the time a lone, starving wolf met a drunken Mondstadt man.

list.name: A Drunkard's Tale (IV)
list.desc: One of many drinking tales popularly told in Mondstadt. This wolf told a tale of wine and wolf to a drunken man of Mondstadt.

list.name: Heavy-Duty Restaurant Stove
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Heavy-Duty Restaurant Stove.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: The Boar Princess (I)
list.desc:
A long, long time ago, in the forest kingdom... What legends occurred there?
The Boar Princess, Part 1. A story about friendship, love, and death.

list.name: The Boar Princess (VII)
list.desc:
All the sacrifices made out in the frozen plains were not in vain. The perfect ending of friendship, love, life and death!
This is the end to the famous and touching story, The Boar Princess.

list.name: The Boar Princess (III)
list.desc:
"Now and evermore shall you be bereft of hope." What fate awaits the wolf pup who bears such a cruel curse?
The Boar Princess, Part 3.

list.name: The Boar Princess (II)
list.desc:
A lifeless ice field, a land even the gentle Anemo Archon has never visited. How is it that it still has its lonely inhabitants?
The Boar Princess, Part 2. The story continues on the glacier.

list.name: The Boar Princess (V)
list.desc:
"No one deserves this fate." The good princess sheds a tear of compassion. For those who persevere as true companions, even the ice shall melt before their determination.
The Boar Princess, Part 5.

list.name: The Boar Princess (VI)
list.desc:
The Boar Princess and her two wise companions brave an icy wasteland and scale a snowy mountain, where they discover a very mysterious inhabitant indeed...
See how this high-altitude, low-temperature adventure unfolds in volume six of The Boar Princess.
There is some childish handwriting on the title page, which reads: "Daddy, when you get home, you have to read me the one about the snowy mountain too!"

list.name: The Boar Princess (IV)
list.desc:
The wolf pup grew up in the cold loneliness. The secret past of the lone wolf is now revealed.
The Boar Princess, Part 4.

list.name: Wild Glaze Lily
list.desc:
Wild Glaze Lilies used in the Rite of Parting.
Due to geological changes, Glaze Lilies have lost their natural habitat. They say that these plants understand human hearts, and will grow to be especially beautiful if serenaded with deep and meaningful songs.

list.name: Chicken-Mushroom Skewer
list.desc: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!

list.name: Golden Shrimp Balls
list.desc: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.

list.name: Metal Key
list.desc: A metal key that one can find just about anywhere, and that can unlock a majority of ordinary doors... Well, probably, anyway.

list.name: Tuna Sushi
list.desc: A traditional dish made with one's bare hands. The soft and lightly-vinegared rice is matched with the fresh fish. Locals consider this a slightly luxurious treat.

list.name: Snapdragon
list.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

list.name: Gilded Scale
list.desc:
Scaled armor that grows naturally over mystical stone, tough and silent, and filled with the strength of the dragon king.
Across the years as countless generations returned to the mulch of the earth, gold and obsidian embedded themselves into flesh and blood forged from bedrock before spreading and turning into scales.
Searing agony, wordless cries... perhaps they will all vanish when the grudges that spawned them, too, finally come to an end.

list.name: Key
list.desc: A unique-looking key. You can open the cage holding Bennett with it.

list.name: Key-Shaped Ward
list.desc:
An ancient and mysterious item shaped like an ancient key. Where there's a key, there's a lock — but this key's lock is about to be breached by the defilement absorbed by the tree's roots.
According to Kazari, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

list.name: Wolfhook
