In terms of the "state" of the many weapons that can be crafted from billets, while their potential has long been contained within the original materials, the exact forms these weapons will ultimately take remain unknown to this day...

list.name: Borderland Claymore Billet
list.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.

In terms of the "state" of the many weapons that can be crafted from billets, while their potential has long been contained within the original materials, the exact forms these weapons will ultimately take remain unknown to this day...

list.name: Borderland Catalyst Billet
list.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.

In terms of the "state" of the many weapons that can be crafted from billets, while their potential has long been contained within the original materials, the exact forms these weapons will ultimately take remain unknown to this day...

list.name: Borderland Polearm Billet
list.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.

In terms of the "state" of the many weapons that can be crafted from billets, while their potential has long been contained within the original materials, the exact forms these weapons will ultimately take remain unknown to this day...

list.name: Cacahuatl
list.desc: A crop rich in flavor. The fleshy part itself features a unique bitterness and its seeds, after being fermented and baked, can be made into other delicacies.

list.name: Embercore Flower
list.desc: A strange flower that can be found all over the plains and highlands. Mature buds will bloom after being hit.

list.name: White Chestnut Oak Wood
list.desc:
Timber obtained from White Chestnut Oak Trees. It strikes a balance between hardness and toughness, making it easy to process. Though it appears no different from most other wood, its color grows lighter once processed using methods common to the tribes of Natlan, becoming nearly white, hence the name.

Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Ashen Aratiku Wood
list.desc:
Timber obtained from Ashen Aratiku Trees. Other than being lighter, it isn't all that different from most regional trees in Natlan. Mature Saurian companions can carry it with ease, and some legends even tell of tribal warriors who use bundles of such timber as fitness gear.

Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Flammabomb Wood
list.desc:
Timber obtained from Flammabomb trees. Unlike what their names suggest, such timber is resistant to catching fire or exploding once processed using methods recommended by the Collective of Plenty.

Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Peach Palm Wood
list.desc:
Timber from Peach Palm Trees. As the name suggests, the bark has the feel of coconut palm husks, and is both smooth and aesthetically pleasing once sanded and polished, with exceptional hardness and humidity-resistant qualities...

Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Suspicious Meatnado
list.desc: A rather popular meat dish At first, things were going well enough, but at the final, crucial moment, the rolled meat suddenly fell apart, causing the meat and side dishes to look like the aftermath of a wild storm...

list.name: Meatnado
list.desc: A rather popular meat dish Bacon and other garnishes are placed over thin slices of meat, which are then rolled up and pan-fried until browned, then simmered in a broth. When the finished dish is cut open, the meat slices stay tightly wrapped around the filling, just like a tornado.

list.name: Delicious Meatnado
list.desc: A rather popular meat dish The rich meat fragrance sweeps through you, body and soul, satisfying what your imagination envisions for bountiful meat. No wonder, then, that this dish often finds itself a place at any joyous gathering.

list.name: Suspicious Apple Roly Poly
list.desc: A traditional apple dessert. Apples are apples, and dough is dough. To force them into a commonality they do not share is to create an awkward mess that even the most flavorful butter cannot rescue.

list.name: Apple Roly Poly
list.desc: A traditional apple dessert. The mere aroma of the apples gives a feeling akin to situating oneself before a warm hearth. Before you can even think to slowly appreciate it, your hands move as if compelled by some other person, knife and fork in tow, reaching out for the next piece.

list.name: Delicious Apple Roly Poly
list.desc: A traditional apple dessert. The mere aroma of the apples gives a feeling akin to situating oneself before a warm hearth. Before you can even think to slowly appreciate it, your hands move as if compelled by some other person, knife and fork in tow, reaching out for the next piece.

list.name: Suspicious Glittering Gemstones
list.desc: Multicolored biscuits. This is exhausting to chew, almost as if your teeth are grinding against real gemstones... Perhaps you might even cause mortal hurt to your foes with this, were you to throw them from a hidden location in battle and catch them unawares.

list.name: Glittering Gemstones
list.desc: Multicolored biscuits. First, use dough to create a gemstone fitting, before adding jam of different colors and flavors to the setting. The result resembles nothing so much as an exquisite gemstone pendant, but be careful not to mix them up with the real thing!

list.name: Delicious Glittering Gemstones
list.desc: Multicolored biscuits. The sour and sweet jam gives off the clear luster of crystalline form, adding a shine to the crunchy treats. Such radiance! Such tastiness! What could this be but equal even to the most precious jewels?

list.name: Suspicious Hot Spring O'Clock
list.desc: A pizza made using Grainfruit. The combination of sweet Grainfruit and salty cheese can make for a romantic encounter but also an irreconcilable clash... Unfortunately, the flavor on this one appears to be the latter.

list.name: Hot Spring O'Clock
list.desc: A pizza made using Grainfruit. Grainfruit is scattered across the crust before a thick layer of cheese is poured on top, and the whole thing is delivered into the oven. The final touch is to then draw a little Koholasaurus picture on it. Eat it while it's hot — the warmth will remind you of a serene time spent enjoying a soothing soak in a hot spring.

list.name: Delicious Hot Spring O'Clock
list.desc: A pizza made using Grainfruit. The cheese pull is like a golden waterfall, descending into your mouth bedecked in juicy Grainfruit. The sweetness and saltiness blend on your tongue, luring forth a boundless appetite within you — even when you finish the whole thing, you could go for more.

list.name: Suspicious Puff Pops
list.desc: A snack with lots of different flavors. To eat several in a row is to experience a myriad of strange flavors that... burn your stomach? Did you just have bad luck with flavors, or are they all like this?

list.name: Puff Pops
list.desc: A snack with lots of different flavors. If you close your eyes, you won't be able to guess what flavor you'll get next, and eating them is sure to increase your heart rate — and that's what makes this popular amongst the Scions of the Canopy. By the way, the "pop" part of the name comes from the sound of Grainfruit kernels bursting open under high temperatures.

list.name: Delicious Puff Pops
list.desc: A snack with lots of different flavors. These surprising flavors of these "little bombs" explode between your teeth. Your left and right hands work in unison, sending more hurtling headlong into your mouth. Om nom nom — amid the sound of chewing, all your stress melts away.

list.name: Suspicious Saurus Crackers
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The bland taste and exquisite appearance make for a horrendous contrast, and when combined with the hard mouthfeel, makes for something that's neither delectable nor inedible... Hmm, would Saurians accept using these as teething sticks?

list.name: Saurus Crackers
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. Light, crispy, sweet, and fragrant, with adorable patterns on top to boot — how could the people of Natlan not be won over by such delectable snacks? Apparently, even the Saurians love 'em... But are crackers really the type of thing Saurians eat?

list.name: Delicious Saurus Crackers
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down. In the end, even the crumbs that slipped through your fingers were not to be spared!

list.name: Suspicious Forest of Color
list.desc: A salad made from fresh fruit and vegetables. Each bite of this is no different from eating raw fruits and vegetables straight up... And once you give it any consideration, you realize that you forgot to add sauce.

list.name: Forest of Color
list.desc: A salad made from fresh fruit and vegetables. Blanch the Grainfruit, chop the other ingredients, drizzle over the sauce, then stir until evenly mixed. Extremely simple to make, but even more importantly, it's so healthy that no matter how much you eat, you won't feel stressed!

list.name: Delicious Forest of Color
list.desc: A salad made from fresh fruit and vegetables. Sweet, sour, and many others constitute a forest of flavor for you to wander through, leaving you with a lasting touch of freshness from your taste buds to your heart.

list.name: Suspicious Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
list.desc: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. The thick sauce has all but drowned out the fish's natural flavors, and the strident taste of mint has all but wiped that of Grilled Fish out.

list.name: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
list.desc: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. The fish is scored, stuffed with spices, then baked. Once cooked, a thick mint sauce is generously drizzled over the top. The refreshing aroma of the fish is enough to whet anyone's appetite.

list.name: Delicious Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
list.desc: Grilled Fish doused in a delicious sauce. Crisp, fragrant fish skin, tender fish meat... Ordinary methods, extraordinary flavor.

list.name: Suspicious Tatacos
list.desc: Thin tacos with filling. The shell looks like thin fabric, but is in truth as cold and hard as iron. The filling's not bad, though, so laying the shell aside, could make for some decent grilled shrimp...

list.name: Tatacos
list.desc: Thin tacos with filling. Making Tatacos is a three-part process — you bake the tacos first, you add vegetables and grilled shrimp second, then finally, you drizzle sauce over the top. In Natlan, it's hard to say which is a more common sight — phlogiston or Tatacos.

list.name: Delicious Tatacos
list.desc: Thin tacos with filling. When your tongue touches the piping-hot shell and its rich filling, a pleasant fragrance gushes out from within, reminding you of a saying from Natlan — "Life might disappoint, but Tatacos, never!"

list.name: Suspicious Sour Sauce Ceviche
list.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. Having not been marinated for nearly long enough, the fish lacks flavor. Fortunately, the fresh ingredients allow the dish as a whole to muddle through, albeit leaving a sense of regret behind.

list.name: Sour Sauce Ceviche
list.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. The fish — which must be fresh — is first skinned and cut into thick chunks, then marinated in the sour sauce until the fish turns white, after which shredded vegetables are added for seasoning. A combination of sour and spicy flavors, it is one of Natlan's most classic flavors.

list.name: Delicious Sour Sauce Ceviche
list.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. The sheer fragrance bowls you over in the first wave, with sourness and spiciness bringing up the rear, granting this fish layers akin to the tides, with you the surfer on a sea of flavor. Even when the tumult has subsided, your yearning remains.

list.name: Suspicious Chocolate
list.desc: Small spherical snacks. The Cacahuatl's unique flavor has been destroyed by a deluge of sugar, ruining the layers in the flavor, leaving naught but stale, sickening, sticky sweetness... You can clean your teeth afterward, sure, but what about the remaining Chocolate?

list.name: Chocolate
list.desc: Small spherical snacks. It is said that where the Cacahuatl was grown has a decisive influence on the flavor of the Chocolate, bestowing upon it a completely unique flavor — whether that be rough earthy undertones or sweet fruity notes... You never know the flavor you're gonna get with the next bite.

list.name: Delicious Chocolate
list.desc: Small spherical snacks. The texture is smooth as swan-down, and as it gradually melts, the Cacahuatl brings out a certain warmth that blends in time with a feather-light sweetness, with a magical final flourish that leaves smiles on everyone's faces.

list.name: Suspicious Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
list.desc: An exquisitely colorful dish. The colors are distinct, and the shape regular, promoting an anticipation that is choked in the crib by the bone-dry potato. Are you sure this is potato mash and not steamed egg yolks?

list.name: Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
list.desc: An exquisitely colorful dish. Mash the potatoes into a fine creamy state, add various fillings in the middle, then finally, drizzle with sauce for a touch of brightness. The end result is not dissimilar from a finely-made cake, and is the favorite dish of many in Natlan.

list.name: Delicious Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
list.desc: An exquisitely colorful dish. The eye-catching colors and soft, delicate texture contain overlapping tastes that bump against your tastebuds in a flavor firework show. Such a perfect appetizer leaves you in unsurpassed anticipation for the main dish.

list.name: Suspicious Cup O' Grainfruit
list.desc: A snack made from Grainfruit. The overheating has caused most of the moisture to evaporate away. Only the dried, utterly unappetizing kernels remain.

list.name: Cup O' Grainfruit
list.desc: A snack made from Grainfruit. The kernels are broken off, then steamed together with Embercore Flower nectar. Each and every one of them ends up being juicy, fragrant, and irresistibly sweet.

list.name: Delicious Cup O' Grainfruit
list.desc: A snack made from Grainfruit. The fresh, plump kernels explode on the tip of your tongue, like a lively party that leaves a lingering sweet aftertaste.

list.name: Suspicious Grainfruit Meat Soup
list.desc: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. The finished product is ashen-grey, a far cry from the bright green you had hoped for... Might this be saved by adding some more vegetables?

list.name: Grainfruit Meat Soup
list.desc: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. When ordering Grainfruit Meat Soup in Natlan, customers can choose from a variety of different broths as well as a wide range of side dishes. The only fixed rule is this — it must contain lots of Grainfruit.

list.name: Delicious Grainfruit Meat Soup
list.desc: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. Any single spoonful includes soft meat, crunchy veggies, and a titillating spiciness... This cornucopia of shifting flavors decrees that you entertain seconds!

list.name: Suspicious Grainfruit Chips
list.desc: Crispy triangular chips. The oily, crunchy pieces collide with sickly sticky cheese to create a greasy texture that can only be stomached once, but never again.

list.name: Grainfruit Chips
list.desc: Crispy triangular chips. After being scooped out of the oil-filled pot, the deep-fried chips are drizzled with sauce, sprinkled with cheese, and finally topped with shredded meat — thus is a hearty Natlan breakfast born.

list.name: Delicious Grainfruit Chips
list.desc: Crispy triangular chips. Crunch-crunch-crunch go the crispy pieces! You simply cannot stop pairing it with the sweet and sour sauce, the rich, fragrant cheese, the delicious shredded meat... Why does this combination have to. Be. So. Delicious?

list.name: Suspicious Fried Shrimp Beanballs
list.desc: A deep-fried snack. The oil in the pot has mercilessly stripped the shrimp of moisture, resulting in a shriveled texture that could have been shown magnanimity if not for the jarring, hard mouthfeel. It's a good thing there are only two products... That makes dealing with them easy enough.

list.name: Fried Shrimp Beanballs
list.desc: A deep-fried snack. First, deep fry the bean flour balls, then stuff them with fillings, fried shrimp, and sauce. Though they may be slightly complicated to prepare, the fact that they're so delicious makes it all worth it.

list.name: Delicious Fried Shrimp Beanballs
list.desc: A deep-fried snack. After experiencing the culinary magic known as deep-frying, this has gained a golden luster, with a crisp shell that tightly locks the juices in along with a crackling, satisfying toothsomeness. Alas, for there only being two per dish! Alas, for you desire more!

list.name: Suspicious Blazed Meat Stew
list.desc: A spicy meat stew. The excessive spiciness sets your mouth ablaze... and your stomach too, once you force the meat down your belabored gullet. Now if only there was a large cup of water to put these flames out...

list.name: Blazed Meat Stew
list.desc: A spicy meat stew. Raw meat is seasoned with an array of different spices, then slow-cooked until tender. The moment you open the lid, a hot and spicy aroma wafts out to greet you. When you're not sure what to eat when it's time to celebrate, you can't go wrong with this!

list.name: Delicious Blazed Meat Stew
list.desc: A spicy meat stew. All manner of spices bring out the rich aroma of meat. A well-tuned spiciness awakens your slumbering tastebuds with its touch, and as the meat meets your teeth, its rich juices spill forth, filling your heart with sumptuous joy. Not a drop, you declare, shall be spared. Not one drop.

list.name: Saurian Hunter's Reward
list.desc: Kinich's specialty. The large, richly flavored chunks of meat come in hot... and spicy to boot. Ajaw keeps mumbling by your side. "Consider yourself lucky to enjoy this for free! Why, in days past, we would only reward ourselves thus for a true big-game hunt. Indeed, you should be offering delicious fruit juice unto me as thanksgiving!" To which Kinich helpfully supplies, "Just eat. Ignore his nonsense."

list.name: Pass the Luck
list.desc: Mualani's specialty. Feet planted on her surfboard, dish in hand, she made not one, not two, but three loops around you before placing the sizable lobster before you. "Ta-da! Super huge and freshly caught — a stroke of luck if ever there was one! And now, I pass that luck onto you!" Her cheerful words all but grant the bean balls wrapped around the shrimp a golden glow.

list.name: Impeccably Organized
list.desc: Kachina's specialty. The chips are arrayed in neat rows, fried just right. In their crunchy deliciousness, you can see Kachina's earnestness and care. Would it be too much motivation for her if you were to tell her how you felt about the dish, plus some compliments?

list.name: Suspicious Golden Apple Pastry
list.desc: A little dessert made from apples. Having been left be too long, the softened outer skin now hides yet softer innards, with a flavor far removed from your envisaging... Uh oh. Your mouth's getting stuck shut...

list.name: Golden Apple Pastry
list.desc: A little dessert made from apples. After being sliced into evenly sized pieces, the apples are mixed with sugar and other spices. The mixture is boiled until it thickens, then wrapped in square puff pastry and baked until it turns golden and puffy. The crispy puff pastry envelops a soft filling within, a delicious treat suitable for anyone.

list.name: Delicious Golden Apple Pastry
list.desc: A little dessert made from apples. The honey-sweet filling surges across your taste buds like a thread of golden light passing through the interlaced fingers of tree and leaf and warming your very heart. Ah, how could you ever stop at one of these?

list.name: Suspicious Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
list.desc: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. There's nothing wrong with the structure itself, but you smell a strange disharmony in its scents... You are apprehensive about giving it a go. Hmm, could it work as a memento instead?

list.name: Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
list.desc: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. Neatly arranged rows of delicate pastries line the box — but what will this goodwill gesture taste like?

list.name: Delicious Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
list.desc: A dessert box based on the recipes of several different companions, simply overflowing with heartfelt intentions. The artisanry here is akin to the exquisite scene of the moon cutting through the clouds. Indeed, you can barely bear to eat such a precious gift.

list.name: Recipe: Meatnado
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Meatnado.

list.name: Recipe: Apple Roly Poly
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Apple Roly Poly.

list.name: Recipe: Glittering Gemstones
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Glittering Gemstones.

list.name: Recipe: Hot Spring O'Clock
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Hot Spring O'Clock.

list.name: Recipe: Puff Pops
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Puff Pops.

list.name: Recipe: Saurus Crackers
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Saurus Crackers.

list.name: Recipe: Forest of Color
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Forest of Color.

list.name: Recipe: Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce.

list.name: Recipe: Tatacos
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tatacos.

list.name: Recipe: Sour Sauce Ceviche
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sour Sauce Ceviche.

list.name: Recipe: Chocolate
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Chocolate.

list.name: Recipe: Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes.

list.name: Recipe: Cup O' Grainfruit
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Cup O' Grainfruit.

list.name: Recipe: Grainfruit Meat Soup
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Grainfruit Meat Soup.

list.name: Recipe: Blazed Meat Stew
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Blazed Meat Stew.

list.name: Recipe: Golden Apple Pastry
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Golden Apple Pastry.

list.name: Recipe: Delights of Wondrous Wanderings
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Delights of Wondrous Wanderings.

list.name: Pyro Sigil
list.desc:
A sigil representing the acknowledgment of Natlan's flames.
Can be offered to the Tablet of Tona at the Temple of Pax to obtain the blessings of the Sacred Flame.

list.name: Pyroculus Resonance Stone
list.desc:
A stone that can be used in Natlan to search for nearby Pyroculi.
During its crafting, adjustments were made to imbue it with characteristics resembling those of the Pyro Statues of The Seven, allowing one to sense the blazing power of the Pyroculi through it.
By sacrificing oneself, the Pyroculi can be returned to the statue, reuniting the scattered flames. Perhaps the Resonance Stone deems this sacrifice to be worth it.

list.name: Pyro Treasure Compass
list.desc:
A compass that can be used in Natlan to search for nearby chests.
Amidst the turmoil and strife that wrack the land, many treasures throughout the vast Nation of Pyro have gone unaccounted for, all trace of their whereabouts lost.

list.name: Firstborn Firesprite
list.desc:
A tiny lifeform that emerged from a flame within a shell.

There is something quite endearing about its over-reliance on the shell it found protecting it at the moment it gained its sentience — perhaps it feels secure in this closed-up world. After all, when its eggshell is completely enclosed, it reigns supreme in its own little universe.

It is said that in ancient times, the Primal Fire burned with a similar life force.

list.name: Graffiti Kamera
list.desc: A "Graffiti Alliance" Kamera provided by "Dopey Dazzler." Functionally, it isn't much different from a standard Kamera. However, it's said that it can capture and record specific scenes and objects, serving as a repository for inspiration and source material for graffiti artists...

list.name: Artifact Transmuter
list.desc:
· Consume Sanctifying Elixir to generate Artifacts through the process of Definition, or consume Artifacts to obtain Sanctifying Elixir through the process of Extraction.
· During each cycle, there is a limit on both the amount of Sanctifying Elixir that can be extracted and the number of times that Artifacts of each Set can be defined.

Artifacts draw their power from stories. This explains how it is possible to attempt to create Artifacts through sacred writings. Legend tells of an instance where seventy sages independently produced identical translations of the same source text; and thus, the original text was considered to be sacred. A person has only to place their hand on this machine and the story behind the Artifact will naturally flow out of it.

list.name: Instructions: Pyroculus Resonance Stone
list.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Pyroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Pyroculi.

list.name: Diagram: Pyro Treasure Compass
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Pyro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Natlan.

list.name: Diagram: Flute of Ezpitzal
list.desc: A forging blueprint passed down from ancient times in Natlan. Learn it and you can restore Flute of Ezpitzal (Sword).

list.name: Diagram: Earth Shaker
list.desc: A forging blueprint passed down from ancient times in Natlan. Learn it and you can restore Earth Shaker (Claymore).

list.name: Diagram: Footprint of the Rainbow
list.desc: A forging blueprint passed down from ancient times in Natlan. Learn it and you can restore Footprint of the Rainbow (Polearm).

list.name: Diagram: Ring of Yaxche
list.desc: A forging blueprint passed down from ancient times in Natlan. Learn it and you can restore Ring of Yaxche (Catalyst).

list.name: Diagram: Chain Breaker
list.desc: A forging blueprint passed down from ancient times in Natlan. Learn it and you can restore Chain Breaker (Bow).

list.name: Colorful Contemplation
list.desc:
Inspiration for graffiti that, following Dopey Dazzler's suggestion, you've gathered from various sightseeing spots across Natlan. When you calm your mind and focus on the act of observing things, you find that you are able to glean a more thorough understanding of their shapes and colors, which proves greatly beneficial when creating graffiti...
Can be used to unlock all sorts of material rewards during the "Traces of Artistry" event.

list.name: "Children of Echoes" Reputation EXP
list.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (Children of Echoes)

list.name: "People of the Springs" Reputation EXP
list.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (People of the Springs)

list.name: "Scions of the Canopy" Reputation EXP
list.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (Scions of the Canopy)

list.name: Sanctifying Elixir
list.desc:
A material that is consumed when defining Artifacts with the Artifact Transmuter.
Artifacts are themselves the crystallized physical manifestation of ideals and memories. This is one of the applications of the noble art of Alchemy — namely, to preserve ideals by crystallizing them inside the essence of material objects. Only in this way can they be molded according to need.

list.name: Yellow Obsidian Fragment
list.desc: An obsidian fragment with engraved patterns styled like those of the Children of Echoes, which you obtained by chance while exploring. It appears that you could form a full ring using three of them, though what that will achieve, you cannot tell.

list.name: Yellow Obsidian Ring
list.desc: An obsidian ring with engraved patterns styled like those of the Children of Echoes. It is an ancient medium by which the tribe established contact with the deep night. Perhaps its strength can allow you to cross the boundary between this place and a certain other location...

list.name: Green Obsidian Fragment
list.desc: An obsidian fragment with engraved patterns styled like those of the Scions of the Canopy, which you obtained by chance while exploring. It appears that you could form a full ring using three of them, though what that will achieve, you cannot tell.

list.name: Green Obsidian Ring
list.desc: An obsidian ring with engraved patterns styled like those of the Scions of the Canopy. It is an ancient medium by which the tribe established contact with the deep night. Perhaps its strength can allow you to cross the boundary between this place and a certain other location...

list.name: Azure Obsidian Fragment
list.desc: An obsidian fragment with engraved patterns styled like those of the People of the Springs, which you obtained by chance while exploring. It appears that you could form a full ring using three of them, though what that will achieve, you cannot tell.

list.name: Azure Obsidian Ring
list.desc: An obsidian ring with engraved patterns styled like those of the People of the Springs. It is an ancient medium by which the tribe established contact with the deep night. Perhaps its strength can allow you to cross the boundary between this place and a certain other location...

list.name: Natlan Shrine of Depths Key
list.desc:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Natlan.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

list.name: Pack of Virtuous Teachings
list.desc:
The Guild will routinely recommend a few books on virtue, from which one can get a glimpse of the character traits prized by the people of different nations.

Upon using this item, you may choose to obtain one of all the two-star Talent Level-Up Materials.

list.name: Borderland Billet Trove
list.desc:
A precious strongbox that contains a billet filled with potential. It is capable of changing its shape to fit the wishes of its owner.

Use this item to choose one of the following items:

·Borderland Sword Billet

·Borderland Bow Billet

·Borderland Claymore Billet

·Borderland Catalyst Billet

·Borderland Polearm Billet

list.name: Guides of a Journey
list.desc:
A collection of epiphanies reached during travels in Teyvat that contains items that can be used to upgrade talents.
Use this item to select one of the following rewards:
·Guide to Freedom, Guide to Resistance, Guide to Ballad
·Guide to Prosperity, Guide to Diligence, Guide to Gold
·Guide to Transience, Guide to Elegance, Guide to Light
·Guide to Admonition, Guide to Ingenuity, Guide to Praxis
·Guide to Equity, Guide to Justice, Guide to Order
·Guide to Contention, Guide to Kindling, Guide to Conflict

list.name: Courier's Trial Keystone
list.desc: A stone mechanism used to unlock the gates of ancient altars. Among the Scions of the Canopy, this mechanism serves as a trial machine, where only the most experienced couriers are said to be able to acquire all three keystones in a short span of time.

list.name: Talisman of Waxaklahun Ubah Kan
list.desc: The talisman of the Sage of the Stolen Flame. It is said that the sage who once stole phlogiston from a dragon's claws left this behind as proof of a pact made with the tribes.

list.name: Night Jade
list.desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. According to Natlan's legends, offering it at a specific altar might just open the path to the kingdom ruled by the night.

list.name: Star Shard
list.desc: A strange fragment that Orqo termed a Star Shard.

list.name: Crude Obsidian Statue
list.desc: A uniquely sculpted obsidian statue with very distinctive contours. It was once used by the people of Natlan as a medium to communicate with the "Night Kingdom."

list.name: Red Metal Key
list.desc: A key you found in the Sulfurous Veins. Who knows where the door it unlocks may lead...

list.name: Green-Edged Paper Slip
list.desc: A special "pass" with green patterns drawn along its edges. It is not clear exactly what material this is made of, and it makes a rustling noise when you rub it. On one corner, it reads "If you have picked this up accidentally, please return it promptly to..." A small map has also been drawn on it.

list.name: Fresh Sour Sauce Kipper
list.desc: Raw pieces of fish with a fruity fragrance. The sheer fragrance bowls you over in the first wave, with sourness and spiciness bringing up the rear, granting this fish layers akin to the tides, with you the surfer on a sea of flavor. Even when the tumult has subsided, your yearning remains.

list.name: A Gem Meant as a Gift
list.desc: A crystal-clear yellow gemstone. Paimon intends to give it to your Saurian companion... but you'll need to process the gem well before it's truly ready to be given away as a gift...

list.name: Iridescent Inscription Fragment
list.desc: A fragment of a shattered Iridescent Inscription. It is broken beyond repair and can no longer serve its purpose. Though dismissed by many as delusional obsession, some still believe they hold the key to unraveling messages from ancient civilizations.

list.name: Golden Entreaty
list.desc: A white disc retrieved from the ruins of the Sage of the Stolen Flame. It is one of the essential tokens required to journey to the Great Volcano of Tollan and remove the "Flamelord's Blessing" from the little Tepetlisaur's back. Golden inscriptions are etched into the surface of the white disc, and when touched, one can sense the intricate patterns pulsating as if imbued with life.

list.name: Cazcal's "Hora Special Care Kit"
list.desc: A set of specialized Saurian care tools personally crafted by Cazcal. Each one has been specially modified for Hora's particular needs.

list.name: "Uthabiti"
list.desc: Kachina's Ancient Name. This plain, unadorned obsidian seems to be a bit heavier than expected. It is said you can use it to find Kachina's approximate location...

list.name: Purpose-Built Grappling Hook
list.desc: A specialized grappling hook used by the Scions of the Canopy that is exceptionally safe. It's quite popular for both rock climbing and to assist with rapid descents.

list.name: Ordinary Obsidian
list.desc: A simple, unadorned piece of obsidian that can become a vessel for an Ancient Name.

list.name: Broken, Graffiti-Marked Stone
list.desc: Part of graffiti art that was once painted onto a wall. Perhaps, if you can put it back in place, you can see what the art was about...

list.name: Shattered Night Jade
list.desc: A nearly weightless black jade, enveloped in chilling flames. If it could be pieced together, perhaps something extraordinary might happen...

list.name: Contending Spark
list.desc: Small sparks born from conflict. They are precisely the forces that eternally sustain the Sacred Flame.

list.name: Ogun's Testimony
list.desc: A record of Ogun's testimony. It contains clearly-listed information on the time of Crafting Bench usage and purpose, and the victim's condition.

list.name: Pampa's Testimony
list.desc: A record of Pampa's testimony. Many exaggerations and redundancies in information make this one much harder to parse.

list.name: The Locusts' Purchase Invoice
list.desc: Amidst these items, only the reason for and quantity of the Loach Pearl purchase seems out of place.

list.name: Anela's Testimony
list.desc: A record of Anela's testimony. Seems like the content is not short on criticism of the Hawkwings, either...

list.name: Map Left Behind by the First Chief
list.desc: A map left behind by the first chief of the People of the Springs. It is said to indicate the route to the mysterious island, yet only skilled guides can decipher its secrets.

list.name: Amina's Coin Pouch
list.desc: A coin pouch that Amina gave you. Inside are funds to deal with scams.

list.name: Kaulu's Recommended Expedition Equipment
list.desc: Expedition equipment that Kaulu recommended you purchase. Though very expensive, the quality doesn't seem to be as good as he made it out to be.

list.name: Photo With Ata
list.desc: A photo with Ata, the Koholasaurus elder. Paimon seems to love it.

list.name: Expedition Equipment Purchased by Mualani
list.desc:
Purchase from Yelafath
High-end camping gear that Mualani has bought for this adventure.

Purchase from Anchieta
High-end camping gear and a special record player model that Mualani has bought for this adventure.

Purchase from Pakaa Nui

Various items that Mualani purchased for this adventure. Camping equipment is a necessity, of course, and the record player and records are for... entertainment during rest time, you suppose?

list.name: Path of Turnfire
list.desc: An illustration of the Turnfire Night ritual. It resembles the Scions of the Canopy's totem.

list.name: Mementos of Teyvat Album
list.desc: An album that features many of [Traveler] and Paimon's mementos of their adventures. Your adventure is not yet over, and you will certainly create many more memories in the future! This album is probably far too thin to contain all the pictures you've taken and will take, so after it's been filled, don't forget to go buy a new one with Paimon!

list.name: Amina's Compensation
list.desc: Remuneration from Amina, as a token of appreciation for helping to convict the scammer "guide."

list.name: Shiny Shell
list.desc: A strangely-shaped shell that you chanced upon in Toyac Springs. Whether or not it can be put to any use is unclear, but nevertheless, Paimon still likes it.

list.name: Atea's Talisman
list.desc:
"Sometimes I wonder — what if the hot springs were never to dry, nor friends to say goodbye..."

"If this land was no longer plagued by darkness, and our children could relish the joys within their reach, free from both care and worry..."

"If a world like that could really exist, just knowing it could would be enough, even if I didn't live to see it... Mavuika, my hot spring buddy and the god I trust and follow..."

"The flames bind us close, and even death cannot part us. Natlan is with you, and no one fights alone."

list.name: Maawe and Monetoo (I)
list.desc: A woven scroll from the People of the Springs telling of how Maawe the Saurian whelp created the hot spring. Different paragraphs of this seem to have been penned by poets of different eras.

list.name: Maawe and Monetoo (II)
list.desc: A woven scroll from the People of the Springs telling of how Maawe the Saurian whelp created the hot spring. Different paragraphs of this seem to have been penned by poets of different eras.

list.name: Maawe and Monetoo (III)
list.desc: A woven scroll from the People of the Springs telling of how Maawe the Saurian whelp created the hot spring. Different paragraphs of this seem to have been penned by poets of different eras.

list.name: Records of Hanan Pacha (I)
list.desc: A fable, passed down from generation to generation, in which the legendary Sage of the Stolen Flame is the main protagonist. Professional historians, it is said, have analyzed its contents and come to a consensus that this tale has nothing to do with historical fact.

list.name: Records of Hanan Pacha (II)
list.desc: A fable, passed down from generation to generation, in which the legendary Sage of the Stolen Flame is the main protagonist. Professional historians, it is said, have analyzed its contents and come to a consensus that this tale has nothing to do with historical fact.

list.name: Records of Hanan Pacha (III)
list.desc: A fable, passed down from generation to generation, in which the legendary Sage of the Stolen Flame is the main protagonist. Professional historians, it is said, have analyzed its contents and come to a consensus that this tale has nothing to do with historical fact.

list.name: The Tale of Qoyllor and Ukuku
list.desc: A long-standing Natlan folk tale that was originally told orally. As such, there is now no way of knowing who the original author was.

list.name: Spinel Fruit
list.desc: The crystalline trees that grow widely in areas with Liquid Phlogiston produce these gem-shaped fruits after absorbing phlogiston.

list.name: Blazing Flint Ore
list.desc:
Known as a raw ore due to the radiant glow it harbors.
When grasped in one's hand, one can feel the fiery pulse thrumming within the stone. Perhaps one day, held high against the starry sky, it might emit a gentle gleam that illuminates the night.

list.name: Reaffirmed Accord of Appellation
list.desc:
Just like when you first met and tied a scarf around his tail, now give him a new "name."
After giving him a new name, it cannot be changed again.

list.name: Pyroculus
list.desc: A substance that has accumulated intense Pyro energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

list.name: Philosophies of a Journey
list.desc:
A collection of epiphanies reached during travels in Teyvat that contains items that can be used to upgrade talents.
Use this item to select one of the following rewards:
·Philosophies of Freedom, Philosophies of Resistance, Philosophies of Ballad
·Philosophies of Prosperity, Philosophies of Diligence, Philosophies of Gold
·Philosophies of Transience, Philosophies of Elegance, Philosophies of Light
·Philosophies of Admonition, Philosophies of Ingenuity, Philosophies of Praxis
·Philosophies of Equity, Philosophies of Justice, Philosophies of Order
·Philosophies of Contention, Philosophies of Kindling, Philosophies of Conflict

list.name: Grainfruit
list.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

list.name: Candlecap Mushroom
list.desc: A fungus that grows on cliff faces or at the foot of mountains, and which shines like a little lamp. You can feel a hint of warmth when your hand draws close.

list.name: Jewel Artisan's Toolbox
list.desc: A suitcase that contains all the tools used by the "Gem Master" Kulahaw when working gems. Some of the tools within are not expensive, but they sure are handy.

list.name: Jewel Artisan's Box of Parts
list.desc: A suitcase containing parts required for jewel processing by "Gem Master" Kulahaw. The components inside are all made of precious materials.

list.name: The Volcano Lord and the Shadow Pins
list.desc: A woven scroll that depicts the legend of the hero Traore, a favorite among the children of the Nanatzcayan.

list.name: The Cornerstone of Stars and Flames
list.desc:
"Heroes ignite the sacred flame, illuminating the world, yet eventually they shall rest, nestled among the stars."

"They left behind a stone, a weaving. With these as our foundation, we have erected an everlasting civilization."

list.name: Commemorative Photo of You and Mualani
list.desc: This memento that you took together captures the moment after you and Mualani completed the journey to the mysterious island with each other's help.

list.name: Gold-Inscribed Secret Source Core
list.desc:
This is a core component that separated from the body of a Secret Source Automaton: Configuration Device that lost its ability to move after being defeated.
Some say that the cores that power all the Secret Source Automatons are actually the same kind of device, and that they simply carry different information, as attested to by the fact that the golden patterns on them are different. At first, the many commands were only added to the circuits to aid in its smooth running, but it seems that all the superimposition and layering of orders onto one another has wound up creating a rudimentary artificial intelligence.

list.name: Suspicious Xocoatl
list.desc: A Natlan drink made from Cacahuatl. If you had to guess before you took a swig, you might assume it would taste either sweet or bitter, but never in a million years would you have expected the sourness that sets upon the tip of your tongue... Did someone add the wrong ingredients?

list.name: Xocoatl
list.desc: A Natlan drink made from Cacahuatl. Initially, bitter Cacahuatl was ground up and blended with various spices, creating the eponymous "bitter water." Much evolution later, added sugar would transform the final product into something fragrant, delectable, and broadly popular, though the name indicating "bitter water" has never changed.

list.name: Delicious Xocoatl
list.desc: A Natlan drink made from Cacahuatl. The rich, deep fragrance of the Cacahuatl is infused with a pure creaminess, tenderly caressing your tongue with the softness of smooth silk, leaving behind a touch of sweetness that is more than enough to melt your heart.

list.name: Fruit-Flavored Milk Candies
list.desc: Xilonen's specialty. As you sit side-by-side atop the tree, she passes you an exquisite box filled with... variously shaped candies? "Cacahuatl is actually considered a kind of fruit. So, it should be fine to call candies made out of cacahuatl and milk 'fruit-flavored.' C'mon, let's dig in." So saying, she swiftly snatches one, tossing it into her mouth before biting down.

list.name: Suspicious BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
list.desc: Commonly seen street-stall barbeque. The fire blazed out of control, burning the outside to charcoal in an instant, while inside, the meat is still half raw. Maybe you can cut off the burnt bits and put the rest back over the charcoal, and try grilling it again, but over a smaller flame this time...

list.name: BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
list.desc: Commonly seen street-stall barbeque. Marinated beef heart is threaded onto skewers before being barbequed over charcoal, grilling forth an enticing aroma and captivating luster. Add on a bit of grilled grainfruit and potato, and you've assembled the eternal golden ensemble of Natlan's street food scene!

list.name: Delicious BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
list.desc: Commonly seen street-stall barbeque. The crackling flames and sizzling sounds herald an imminent feast, igniting your craving for that first bite. The firmness of the thick hunks of meat and the abundance of savory juices that burst forth with every bite perfectly complement one another in a culinary experience that might be called bathing in BBQ bliss.

list.name: Recipe: BBQ Beef Heart Skewers
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making BBQ Beef Heart Skewers.

list.name: Recipe: Xocoatl
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Xocoatl.

list.name: Pilgrim's Chronicle
list.desc:
Obtained from the Lord of the Night, this material plays a key role in the creation of Ancient Names. Its essence is "memory," for Natlan's Ley Lines do not record the adventures of outsiders, and so, a special "vessel" is needed here.

Memory flows within this receptacle, and if you focus on its surface, it will display the vital footprints you have left in Natlan.

From what you've heard, Xilonen and Citlali had a rather easy time obtaining this material. This, you presume, is thanks to the Lord of the Night's gentleness and generosity.

list.name: Somewhat Aged Copy of "Tequil the Brave"
list.desc: Somewhat Aged Copy of "Tequil the Brave."

list.name: Spanking New Copy of "Tequil the Brave"
list.desc: Spanking New Copy of "Tequil the Brave."

list.name: Captured Photos
list.desc: A batch of photos you got from the Fatui that clearly shows the structure of the Remnants of the Secret Source in this place. This picture shows a special mechanism with a very noteworthy shape.

list.name: Fires of Autumn Twilight (I)
list.desc: A woven scroll from the Flower-Feather Clan. It seems like it consists of what were originally two separate stories from different eras that were then merged together at some unknown time.

list.name: Fires of Autumn Twilight (II)
list.desc: A woven scroll from the Flower-Feather Clan. It seems like it consists of what were originally two separate stories from different eras that were then merged together at some unknown time.

list.name: Fires of Autumn Twilight (III)
list.desc: A woven scroll from the Flower-Feather Clan. It seems like it consists of what were originally two separate stories from different eras that were then merged together at some unknown time.

list.name: Springs of Hidden Jade (I)
list.desc: What kind of passerby will the young man, lost in a secluded bamboo grove, meet along his way?

list.name: Springs of Hidden Jade (II)
list.desc: What kind of passerby will the young man, lost in a secluded bamboo grove, meet along his way?

list.name: Mt. Lingmeng Gossip (I)
list.desc: A book about the local folklore and ballads of Chenyu Vale. It contains many far-fetched folk legends.

list.name: Mt. Lingmeng Gossip (II)
list.desc: A book about the local folklore and ballads of Chenyu Vale. It contains many far-fetched folk legends.

list.name: Mt. Lingmeng Gossip (III)
list.desc: A book about the local folklore and ballads of Chenyu Vale. It contains many far-fetched folk legends.

list.name: The Tale of Kuntur
list.desc: A long-standing Natlan folk tale that was originally recounted orally. As such, there is now no way of knowing who the original author was.

list.name: Incense Ashcrystals
list.desc: When a person burns incense to enter a state of clairvoyance, the ash leftover from the consumed incense condenses into these crystals. The sides reflect the time that was spent Spiritseeking.

list.name: Masters of the Night-Wind Reputation EXP
list.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (Masters of the Night-Wind)

list.name: Flower-Feather Clan Reputation EXP
list.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (Flower-Feather Clan)

list.name: Glowing Hornshroom
list.desc: A fungus that emits a faint light in the darkness. It is so named because its shape resembles the horny crest of an Iktomisaurus.

list.name: Withering Purpurbloom
list.desc: A flower, the leaves and petals of which look scorched and withered, that can often be seen in places where ash abounds.

list.name: Purple Obsidian Fragment
list.desc: An obsidian fragment with engraved patterns styled like those of the Masters of the Night-Wind, which you obtained by chance while exploring. It appears that you could form a full ring using three of them, though what that will achieve, you cannot tell.

list.name: Purple Obsidian Ring
list.desc: An obsidian ring with engraved patterns styled like those of the Masters of the Night-Wind. It is an ancient medium by which the tribe established contact with the deep night. Perhaps its strength can allow you to cross the boundary between this place and a certain other location...

list.name: Crimson Obsidian Fragment
list.desc: An obsidian fragment with engraved patterns styled like those of the Flower-Feather Clan, which you obtained by chance while exploring. It appears that you could form a full ring using three of them, though what that will achieve, you cannot tell.

list.name: Crimson Obsidian Ring
list.desc: An obsidian ring with engraved patterns styled like those of the Flower-Feather Clan. It is an ancient medium by which the tribe established contact with the deep night. Perhaps its strength can allow you to cross the boundary between this place and a certain other location...

list.name: Suspicious Surf, Turf, and Perch
list.desc: A large platter with a mix of meat and vegetables. First, you find yourself biting into a half-raw skewer of meat; next, a chunk of charred fish. The contrast is so jarring that you simply can't muster up the courage to take a third bite...

list.name: Surf, Turf, and Perch
list.desc: A large platter with a mix of meat and vegetables. Various ingredients from the sea, land, and air have been roasted and mixed together. There's something for everyone here, making it a must-have at any important banquet in Natlan.

list.name: Delicious Surf, Turf, and Perch
list.desc: A large platter with a mix of meat and vegetables. Thick, juicy chunks of meat have soaked up all the spices, mingling delightfully with the crispness of the fruit and vegetables on the tip of your tongue, touching more than just your taste buds, as your stomach is also moved to satisfaction. No wonder this dish has so many loyal fans.

list.name: Suspicious Volcano Cake
list.desc: A volcano-shaped cake. The "mountain" has failed to fully contain the "lava" within, resulting in a collapse that genuinely resembles a volcanic eruption, bringing calamity to the tray beneath. Looks like some cleanup is in order before the next try...

list.name: Volcano Cake
list.desc: A volcano-shaped cake. The ingredients were mixed together, stirred into a thick paste, then poured into a mold for baking. Timing it to perfection allows the outer layer to solidify while the filling remains soft and gooey, just like a real volcano.

list.name: Delicious Volcano Cake
list.desc: A volcano-shaped cake. The steaming hot "little volcano" finds its perfect foil in the icy-cool "ash cloud" that rises above. Aside from its irresistible sweetness, the aroma of the flowing "lava" brings you a deep sense of satisfaction and comfort.

list.name: Suspicious Grainfruit Wrap
list.desc: A staple food wrapped in big leaves. It basically tastes the same as biting into raw Grainfruit, begging the question of what the purpose of cooking it was...

list.name: Grainfruit Wrap
list.desc: A staple food wrapped in big leaves. There's a simple saying in Natlan that goes like this: "A leaf to wrap your Grainfruit with will always fall." It's used to express the idea of things being fated to happen.

list.name: Delicious Grainfruit Wrap
list.desc: A staple food wrapped in big leaves. The light fragrance of Grainfruit rises up from the soft, velvety filling within. As it melts in your mouth, its sweet and spicy notes combine with a touch of saltiness, resulting in a gustatory experience that is nothing short of sumptuously rich.

list.name: Suspicious Mystique Soup
list.desc: A drink made from Grainfruit. One sip and all your taste buds begin to tingle. It's almost like an "endless aftertaste," for the flavor is so intense that it lingers on the tip of your tongue, and even drinking water cannot wash it away.

list.name: Mystique Soup
list.desc: A drink made from Grainfruit. The cup is full of still, bright liquid, with the magnificent hues of a gemstone with a stunning gradient. Its subtle fragrance and delicate sweetness combine to evoke the mysteries of an ancient tribe, leaving those that partake yearning for more.

list.name: Delicious Mystique Soup
list.desc: A drink made from Grainfruit. The cup is full of still, bright liquid, with the magnificent hues of a gemstone with a stunning gradient. Its subtle fragrance and delicate sweetness combine to evoke the mysteries of an ancient tribe, leaving those that partake yearning for more.

list.name: Suspicious Sing Your Heart Out
list.desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Its icy taste rushes through your mouth, setting your teeth chattering involuntarily and nearly half-freezing your heart. Forget about singing your heart out — even just making yourself understood is now a challenge...

list.name: Sing Your Heart Out
list.desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Said to be the Flower-Feather Clan's secret weapon for soothing their throats and protecting their vocal cords — so eat one and go sing your heart out! Just make sure you don't go overboard, as too much sugar can leave your throat feeling hoarse.

list.name: Delicious Sing Your Heart Out
list.desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. These exquisitely crafted candies seem to send a wave of coolness down your throat, relieving hoarseness like bubbling springwater spilling forth and cleansing parched earth. Your voice is left sounding as clear as a newly-fledged hatchling, eager to spread its wings and fly up into the sky.

list.name: Honey-Glazed Ceviche
list.desc: Ororon's specialty. "This is to honor my elders." And without further ado, the fish slices were served up, glistening with juicy deliciousness. From the sweet, delicate flavor, you can tell that the sauce most likely contains honey of the highest caliber, the gathering of which must have required a great deal of thought and effort. It's not often that you get to witness such displays of filial respect.

list.name: Moment of Respite
list.desc: Chasca's specialty. Piled high with ingredients, few can resist the aroma of this dish. Even someone in the midst of an argument might find their anger turn to hunger at the mere whiff of it. Wait a moment, those Saurians who were rolling around in the distance just now... Why have they suddenly started looking this way too?

list.name: Recipe: Surf, Turf, and Perch
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Surf, Turf, and Perch.

list.name: Recipe: Volcano Cake
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Volcano Cake.

list.name: Recipe: Grainfruit Wrap
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Grainfruit Wrap.

list.name: Recipe: Mystique Soup
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mystique Soup.

list.name: Recipe: Sing Your Heart Out
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sing Your Heart Out.

list.name: Spinelgrain Bait
list.desc:
Made from a mixture of Spinel Fruit and Grainfruit, this peculiar Natlan fish bait can maintain its shape even after having been submerged for extended periods of time. By dissipating flavor at a consistent rate, its remarkable power to attract fish continues unabated for a very long time indeed.

Suitable for catching normal Rapidfish, Sunfish, and normal Unihornfish.

list.name: Emberglow Bait
list.desc:
Made using a specialized method from a mixture of Embercore Flowers and Wheat, this peculiar Natlan fish bait is said to maintain a specific temperature underwater that certain fishes are sensitive to, thereby attracting their attention.

Suitable for catching Phlogiston-dwelling fish.

list.name: Refractive Bud
list.desc:
A leaf bud dropped by the monster known as the Tenebrous Mimiflora after being vanquished.
It is said that when this creature emerged from the Black Tide, the first things it grew were these tender buds capable of deflecting elemental power.

list.name: Bewildering Broadleaf
list.desc:
An arrow-shaped leaf dropped by the monster known as the Tenebrous Mimiflora after being vanquished.
After corroding the Ley Lines and extracting the memories within, the creature grows these leaves as a means of storing the information it has deciphered. There may be a close link between these intricately patterned leaves and the forms that their host can mimic.

list.name: Illusory Leafcoil
list.desc:
A core formed from tightly coiled leaves, the remnant of the monster known as the Tenebrous Mimiflora after being vanquished.
It may appear lifeless and dull on the surface, yet a faint, ominous power can still be sensed pulsing within.
People often wonder where the memories that such creatures drew from the earth go when they are slain. Perhaps the answer lies within this core...

list.name: Tepal's Tattered Notes
list.desc: An incomplete notebook in which Tepal has recorded his obsessions and dreams.

list.name: Key Found by the "Painted Stone Challenge" Podium
list.desc: A key you found by the "Painted Stone Challenge" podium. Going by the rules of common sense, you'd probably guess that the door it unlocks must be somewhere nearby said podium...

list.name: Secret Art Grilled Fish in Mint Sauce
list.desc:
Grilled Fish doused in delicious sauce. Under your and Paimon's careful hands, the fish has been meticulously scored, stuffed with specially selected spices, then baked. Once cooked, a thick mint sauce is generously drizzled over the top. The refreshing aroma of the fish is enough to whet anyone's appetite.
If you can master the art of grilling fish this way, perhaps one day you and Paimon will earn the title of Grilled Fish Master Chefs...

list.name: Nearby Flammabomb Wood
list.desc:
This tree has a rather frightening name, but is, in fact, not prone to spontaneous ignition. Its name simply comes from its striking crown, which resembles an exploding fireball...
You saw lumps of such processed wood scattered on the ground, yet no trees nearby that could produce it. Someone must have deliberately brought them here...

list.name: Nearby Ashen Aratiku Wood
list.desc:
A tree that can be found in a specific region in Natlan. Their numbers are few...
You saw lumps of such processed wood scattered on the ground, yet no trees nearby that could produce it. Someone must have deliberately brought them here...

list.name: Smooth-Bitted Key
list.desc: A key with a smoothly curved bit, almost like an arc. Somewhere out there, perhaps there's a door it could easily open...

list.name: Straight-Bitted Key
list.desc: A key with extremely straight bitting. Somewhere out there, perhaps there's a door it could easily open...

list.name: Messily-Bitted Key
list.desc: A key with worn teeth that look quite messy after many years of action. Perhaps it requires a bit of "technique" to actually use...

list.name: Glowing Hornshroom Seed
list.desc: A seed obtained from the Seed Dispensary. A quality seed full of life, just waiting to be planted in the fields of the Realm Within. After some time, it will grow into a Glowing Hornshroom.

list.name: Radiant Spincrystal 141
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is a mysterious melody from Natlan.

list.name: Radiant Spincrystal 142
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is a mysterious melody from Natlan.

list.name: Radiant Spincrystal 143
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is a mysterious melody from Natlan.

list.name: Radiant Spincrystal 144
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is a mysterious melody from Natlan.

list.name: Radiant Spincrystal 145
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is a mysterious melody from Natlan.

list.name: Radiant Spincrystal 146
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is a mysterious melody from Natlan.

list.name: Radiant Spincrystal 147
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is a mysterious melody from Natlan.

list.name: Shuttle of Odara
list.desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Calamity of Eshu."
Refracting an eerie, prism-like light, this jade pendant emits a chilling aura that does not disappear, even were it to be cast within a roaring blaze.
In ancient shamanic traditions, the "shuttle" symbolizes a medium that pierces through different realms. It is said that in the era of barbarism, before humans knew how to count their days or to weave their tales, the mighty dragons who then roamed the Soulfire Plains had a word for a construct that traversed the pitch-black darkness between the stars. In their long-forgotten language, they called such creations "Void Shuttles" — blazing javelins that could pierce anything, even a veil thick enough to enshroud an entire world.
Of course, given that the source of this story was the crafty trickster Sanhaj, it may well be that this was nothing but another of his countless tall tales, told with the sole intention of earning himself a meal and a drink. Today, some of the most respected priests of the Masters of the Night-Wind still hold this view.

list.name: Flowhorn Flounderfinder
list.desc:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Natlan.
A specialty rod of the Natlan Fishing Association. Crafted from weapons-grade metal, it has also been carved with a fine design that features Long-Necked Rhinos and Flowcurrent Birds, ensuring both durability and style.
Anglers often speculate that, if only it felt inclined to harness the potential of its exceedingly long neck, the Long-Necked Rhino might become the most gifted fisher in the entire natural world. Meanwhile, the seemingly clumsy Flowcurrent Bird actually has to rely upon catching fish to survive. Together, therefore, they would make the perfect fishing partners — thus, having them both on the same rod is believed to bring anglers exceptional luck!

list.name: Formula: Spinelgrain Bait
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Spinelgrain Bait.

list.name: Formula: Emberglow Bait
list.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Emberglow Bait.

list.name: Golden Entreaty
list.desc: A white disc retrieved from the ruler of Cinder City's corroded ruins within Ochkanatlan. It is one of the essential tokens required to journey to the Great Volcano of Tollan and remove the "Flamelord's Blessing" from the little Tepetlisaur's body, and is said to have been one of the fragments left behind when the Flamelord's eye was split in two. According to legend, it is said that the ancient Dragonlord — who once held dominion over all light and wisdom — transformed one of his eyes into a conduit of supreme authority by which all flames might be governed, and that this became his only exploitable weakness...

list.name: Ensnaring Gaze
list.desc:
An object obtained after defeating the monster known as the Tenebrous Papilla. It may look like a piece of fruit, but it is not.
Formed from energy that has condensed in a single spot, its "eye" seems to gaze out from a distant, dark otherworld.

list.name: Water-Rusted Key
list.desc: A key that soaked in water for a long, long time. Who knows if it can even unlock the door it was made to open anymore...

list.name: Ancient Jadestone Fragment
list.desc:
A strange fragment picked up in the ancient ruins of Natlan. The exact material it is made from is hard to determine.
For some reason it feels warm to the touch.

list.name: Perfect Heart of the Sacred Dragon
list.desc:
A flawless piece of jade. Before the fires of human civilization had ever been kindled, it was the heart of the Dragonlord Ix Uxul Tz'ib Bolon Ch'ule-L, ruler of Chichen Uctokah.
It once held the authority to command all devices within Ochkanatlan, the ineffable city, yet can no longer be used due to its energy having been completely exhausted.
Just as with the half-humans who pursued it so relentlessly, the Dragonlord's quest for perfection was ultimately in vain, leading to naught but an end that was as cold and lifeless as jade.

list.name: Ancient Flint Key
list.desc: A uniquely shaped key. It seems like rotating it to different angles will enable it to fit into various locks...

list.name: Key From a Balloon Platform
list.desc: It looks like it's for opening a cage from a camp below a hot air balloon somewhere... But would someone really be kept in a cage like that?

list.name: Pyrophosphorite
list.desc: An ordinary-looking stone that seems to be the key to unlocking the secrets hidden within the legendary Tonatiuh.

list.name: Dye Samples
list.desc: Dye samples made from a special fruit, found deep within a cave. They seem to be the key to making that type of woven scroll.

list.name: Medicine of Greater Efficacy
list.desc: Saurian medicine personally concocted by Mazkal. Its healing effect is outstanding.

list.name: Medicine of Superior Taste
list.desc: Saurian medicine personally concocted by Mazkal that tastes absolutely amazing.

list.name: A Nameless Adventurer's Notes
list.desc: Notes left by an adventurer of an unknown era. In them, they recorded their adventures in Ochkanatlan.

list.name: Repertoire Coins
list.desc: Currency gained from completing "Repertoire of Myriad Melodies" performances. Proof that you've been acknowledged as one who loves music and rhythm. Can be exchanged at the "Treasure of Myriad Melodies" for unique rewards.

list.name: Citlali's Handkerchief
list.desc: A handkerchief that Citlali gave you as a gift. May its colors ever stay in your memory — as a present, and as a promise.

list.name: Legend-Inscribed Woven Scroll
list.desc: A woven scroll that Citlali helped you complete. It chronicles the legendary battle you undertook to become a hero of Natlan.

list.name: "Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power," First Edition
list.desc: The first edition of "Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power." A very costly item to collect on account of its limited print run.

list.name: "Pretty Please, Kitsune Guuji?" Limited Deluxe Edition
list.desc: The limited deluxe edition of "Pretty Please, Kitsune Guuji?" The Yae Publishing House released this limited print run in response to its readers. Stocks were all but emptied out the instant these came to market, making them a much sought-after collector's item amongst light novel lovers.

list.name: Citlali's Handkerchief and Key
list.desc: The key given to you by Citlali so that "you won't wake me up by beating on my door while I'm drunk." You carefully place it alongside the handkerchief she gave you. After all, you've collected so many keys in the past, so this one needs to have a special mark to stand out.

list.name: A "Gift Envelope" From Paimon
list.desc: To my best— no, bestest travel companion ever!!!

list.name: Emblem of Valor
list.desc:
A commemorative portrait of you and your companions, which you obtained after assisting the combat readiness liaison Irade with stage certification.
According to her, after having been crafted by three masters and certified by you, the stages may now have reached such a level of perfection as to require no further iteration. They will surely become the first port of call for warriors looking to challenge themselves and hone their martial prowess...

list.name: Special Commemorative Letter
list.desc:
A souvenir obtained after assisting the combat readiness liaison in testing and certifying various stages...
Complete the Archon Quest "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection" to use, thereby earning an "Emblem of Steadfast Valor" as a special gift.

list.name: Rattan Toy
list.desc: A rattan toy left behind by someone, perhaps Lan Yan. It is slightly different from the ones at the fair, having a mysterious sigil stuck to it, indicating some other purpose.

list.name: Rattan Toy: Hu Tao
list.desc: A rattan figure that Lan Yan made specially for Hu Tao. It contains mysterious spellwork that can be used to distribute Fetor for the latter. However, due to your special relationship with the Ley Lines, your rattan figure cannot be linked up to the array...

list.name: Hu Tao: Plum Branch
list.desc: The night was suddenly filled with the fragrance of plum blossoms, spreading across the springtime sky and land.

list.name: Zhongli: Rex Coin
list.desc: A Fortune Coin with a special Guyan Sigil engraved into it. It is said that this is the symbol of Rex Lapis, and can be used as a protective talisman.

list.name: Saurus Crackers: Tatankasaurus
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful, irresistible interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down... Be that as it may, you received these treats on the parade of blessings and it might be nicer to keep them as an uneaten memento.

list.name: Saurus Crackers: Qucusaurus
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful, irresistible interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down... Be that as it may, you received these treats on the parade of blessings and it might be nicer to keep them as an uneaten memento.

list.name: Saurus Crackers: Yumkasaurus
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful, irresistible interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down... Be that as it may, you received these treats on the parade of blessings and it might be nicer to keep them as an uneaten memento.

list.name: Saurus Crackers: Iktomisaurus
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful, irresistible interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down... Be that as it may, you received these treats on the parade of blessings and it might be nicer to keep them as an uneaten memento.

list.name: Saurus Crackers: Koholasaurus
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful, irresistible interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down... Be that as it may, you received these treats on the parade of blessings and it might be nicer to keep them as an uneaten memento.

list.name: Saurus Crackers: Tepetlisaurus
list.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful, irresistible interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down... Be that as it may, you received these treats on the parade of blessings and it might be nicer to keep them as an uneaten memento.

list.name: Repertoire of Myriad Melodies
list.desc:
A collection of sheet music given to you by Sansa the bard. It contains musical scores and performance insights gathered from various nations, penned in such detail as to rival a musical encyclopedia.
With such a collection at their disposal, a musician could play many enchanting melodies indeed...

list.name: Djem Djem Drum
list.desc:
A traditional instrument from Natlan that can be used in performances.
A percussion instrument with a skin drumhead that can be played with one's bare hands. Tuned using ropes, it has a unique sound that, in skilled hands, can add a rich rhythm to any song.

list.name: Ukulele
list.desc:
A traditional instrument from Natlan that can be used in performances.
A small, four-stringed lute shaped similarly to — and which plays like — a guitar, though its fret count and tuning differ. Thanks to the material the strings are made of, it sounds clear and bright, yet soft, soothing the hearts of those who hear it.

list.name: Scroll of the Fiery Firmament
list.desc:
This Natlan woven scroll, depicting unique landscapes and containing hidden powers, is a souvenir brought back from Natlan by the Teapot Traveling Salesman, Chubby.
The patterns on the scroll bring certain images to mind, which you can manipulate via the power of Sub-Space Creation to recreate the wondrous sights of Natlan in your Realm Within...

list.name: Suspicious Magmic Ode
list.desc:
An ancient Natlan dish. If there's still a hint of hope when the coarse, sandy texture touches your tongue, that last shred of optimism vanishes the moment the earthy taste hits your palate.

When exactly did it sneak its way in?

list.name: Magmic Ode
list.desc: An ancient Natlan dish. Traditionally, the ingredients are wrapped in large leaves and steam-baked in a pit using red-hot stones. When billows of steam begin to rise like clouds, this Natlan delicacy, perfect for sharing with larger groups, is ready to serve.

list.name: Delicious Magmic Ode
list.desc: An ancient Natlan dish. The meticulous roasting locks the juices tightly within the ingredients, while a subtle smokiness lingers like faint golden threads sewn on rare woven scrolls, elevating the flaavor to new heights. A single bite will make anyone uncontrollably cheer in delight.

list.name: Suspicious Qingxin Flower Cake
list.desc: A cake made from flowers. The dry, hard texture and bland flavor bear no resemblance to the delicate nature that flowers should possess. One can't help but wonder if the filling is actually made of scraps of paper...

list.name: Qingxin Flower Cake
list.desc: A cake made from flowers. Prepared with Qingxin petals still glistening with their morning dew, the filling is wrapped in many layers consisting of two different types of pastry — a flaky crust and a buttery dough. Baked to perfection, Qingxin Flower Cakes are best enjoyed fresh from the oven.

list.name: Delicious Qingxin Flower Cake
list.desc: A cake made from flowers. With a gentle bite, the blossoms swaying in the mountains seem to bloom in your mouth, and the fragrance of flowers feels as if it seeps into your very soul. As you reluctantly finish the last bite, a faint, lingering scent remains on your fingers...

list.name: Suspicious Drunken Plums in Snow
list.desc: An elegant-looking Liyue dish. The final presentation seems flawless, but hidden within the carefully disassembled crab meat are small, unnoticed fragments of shell. Before indulging, one must overcome a sense of unease, as there's always the risk of your teeth meeting a shard of hard chitin...

list.name: Drunken Plums in Snow
list.desc: An elegant-looking Liyue dish. Once the crab is steamed, its roe and meat are carefully removed, stir-fried, then returned to the shell. Egg whites are whipped into a frothy coating to seal the crab shell, topped with finely chopped ham for a touch of color, then the whole thing is baked. Together, the succulent crab meat and fluffy egg whites make a combination that's sure to impress.

list.name: Delicious Drunken Plums in Snow
